293741449.Name: Berlin E-mobility Founders Tuesday
293741449.Long Description:
This is a meet-up group for founders or founders to be, who are looking for technical or marketing co-founders, as well as early stage investors, and are still gathering all the ingredients and infos to build their product, validate their business case and launch their e-mobility start-up on the market.
This meet-up is for you if:
You have an idea and are considering launching a start-up in the next 3-6 months that is based on an e-mobility - digital business model
You are looking for like-minded co-founders or early employees (i.e. techies, marketing)
You are looking for early stage investors and mentors to help you with funding and to maximize your chances and to point out common pitfalls in starting a new company
You have great drive, knowledge of the e-mobility industry and have found a relevant problem you have the knowledge and passion to solve
Our Agenda:
We meet once per month on Tuesday for networking, finding co-founders, investors and sharing our e-mobility idea for what's worked and what not, what to look out for and how to find and set-up all the ingredients for success: people, tech, strategy, execution and cash.
Every start-up can apply to pitch at the event to share their vision and find what they are looking for. Just send us (the organizer) a message.
We will also feature speakers (serial founders, investors, corporate CEOs, industry experts) on a regular basis, that are announced before the event.
When will it take place:
Every 2nd Tuesday if there are 5 or more RSVPs.
No events on bank holidays and between December 20th-January 10th; July 15 - August 30th.
About us, the organizers:
We are a group of passionate entrepreneurs, company builders and early stage investors, with the vision of empowering great ideas, to validate them with first users and to launch them on the market: quickly and effectively. We actively contribute business, tech and marketing skills to early stage start-ups in our program, provide mentoring, proactive investor support and structure the process from start to launch with skin in the game through sweat for equity.
Find out more about our Venture Builder B-works here

293427591.Name: Startup Co-Founders Matching | On-Site-Event
293427591.Long Description:
### Join us for our Co-founds matching: Women in Tech & Diversity Welcome!
SIBB Digital Transition Incubator presents a unique opportunity for individuals to collaborate and form new startup projects. Here's how you can participate:
If you have a brilliant startup idea but need team members, prepare a concise 1-minute elevator pitch. Describe your project's mission, product, and technology, as well as the skills and personality traits you're seeking in a teammate. Please avoid focusing on growth and financial numbers, buzzwords, or C-level management.
OR
If you possess valuable skills and want to contribute to an exciting project, prepare a 1-minute pitch showcasing your expertise and professional experience.
Seize this opportunity to form meaningful connections and, if you find the right team, apply directly for our Startup Accelerator! Get to know everything about our 50K no-equity funding program that will start on September 01, 2023.
### M﻿ore information here: https://www.sibb.de/incubator-apply
###
## Agenda
1) Intro: SIBB Digital Transition Incubator
2) Introduction to matching procedure
3) Start of "speed-geeking"

293463364.Name: Co-Founder Networking: Find a Business Partner, Online
293463364.Long Description:
One of the most difficult yet important steps in founding a startup is building a great Co-founder team. While many founders may start alone, there are multiple benefits of having a Co-founder, and taking the time to establish a quality team can mean the difference between failure and success. Join us for this fun and interactive online event in Silicon Valley where you will learn best practices for finding and formalizing a Co-founder. In addition, you will have the opportunity to network with others looking for a Co-founder through fun group networking, and one-to-one sessions.
It is not required, but to get the most out of this co-founder networking event, we recommend that you come ready for live video networking and prepare by visiting our Guide to Find a Co-Founder . You can also use this Co-Founder Networking Worksheet prior to joining the event.
To access all of the networking features of this webinar, please join using Chrome or Firefox from a desktop or tablet, or download the Airmeet Mobile App.
❯ Who Should Attend
Anyone who is launching or thinking about launching a Silicon Valley startup
Anyone looking for a co-founder and/or looking to learn about building a co-founder relationship
Anyone interested in finding opportunities with startups
❯ What is the Agenda
Introduction
Short presentation on best practices for finding and formalizing a Co-founder
Group and one-to-one speed networking with others looking for a Co-founder
❯ What Will You Accomplish
Meet startup enthusiasts and experts from around the world
Shortlist individuals that can be a Co-founder
❯❯ This is a live, interactive online event, so be sure to RSVP at https://fi.co/e/323834/meetup to receive the Zoom URL to join us live!

293650256.Name: eXponential Finance Live: Glasp with Co-Founder Kei Watanabe
293650256.Long Description:
Glasp aims to democratize access to other people’s learning and experiences that they have collected throughout their lives as a utilitarian legacy. It is a Generative AI startup, founded by a Japanese team in San Francisco, targeting the American market right out of the gate. Following the US, India & Japan are their second & third most active user base, respectively.
Natural Language Processing (NLP) has long had a strong use case in Finance, so while Glasp is not focused on a specific vertical, the insights shared will be directly applicable to different areas in financial services.
We are excited to welcome Kei Watanabe, Co-Founder and Product Manager at Glasp, and appreciate the opportunity to speak live to the people who are actually building with Generative AI.
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please subscribe to our weekly LinkedIn newsletter, the "Japan FinTech Observer", at the following link: https://lnkd.in/gNjUuSxG
-------------------------------------------------------------------
You can also find us on:
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/tokyofintech/
Podcast: https://anchor.fm/exponentialfinance
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/tokyofintech
Medium: https://medium.com/tokyo-fintech

Angel and early-stage investors looking to invest in startups

Founder Showcase is hosted by HubSpot for Startups

293084013.Name: Georgia - an IT paradise
293084013.Long Description:
Calling all startups and SMBs interested to grow their teams!
Join us on for in person meetup where we'll discuss all things related to:
Outstaffing in Georgia & Caucasus region + its benefits
Talent pool & their skills
Georgian work culture
Taxes in Georgia.
Whether you're looking to expand your team or simply curious about the region, this is the perfect opportunity to learn from experts in the field and connect with like-minded individuals.
The speaker:
Valerian Gegidze
CEO & Founder at Gegidze, a serial entrepreneur and angel investor from Tbilisi, Georgia. He specializes in HR, tech, design, and marketing. He has over 15 years of experience working in business development & marketing.
"My entrepreneurial goal is to provide the world with the best experience with Georgian products and services. I am driven by the idea of developing my homeland - Georgia and the Caucasus region and changing the lives of locals for the better, by providing them with international jobs and the most competitive salaries, benefits, and opportunities."
He's deeply passionate about creating & supporting startups all over the world. Valerian helps entrepreneurs and business owners navigate their companies and achieve their business goals.
The host:
Matti Kawecki
Introvert engineer in sales and business development, serial entrepreneur, who switched to consulting, business angel at the Estonian Business Angel Network.

293697003.Name: Lerne Reden zu halten und Menschen zu begeistern | Berliner Rhetorikmeister
293697003.Long Description:
Liebe Rhetorikfreunde,
Habt ihr Lust, die Kunst des Redens zu erlernen?
Du kannst als Gast einfach reinschnuppern oder als Clubmitglied das volle Programme nutzen.
Mithilfe eines ausgezeichneten praxisorientierten Programms kannst du einen von 11 verschiedenen Lernpfaden auswählen und in 5 aufeinander aufbauenden Stufen lernen:
frei und ohne Blackout zu reden
unterhaltsam und überzeugend zu präsentieren
souverän zu moderieren
Deine Körpersprache wirkungsvoll einzusetzen
spontan zu einem vorher unbekannten Thema zu pitchen
Haben wir dich neugierig gemacht?
Ganz gleich, ob du einfach mal „reinschnuppern“ oder dein Können gleich mit einer kurzen Stegreifrede unter Beweis stellen möchtest – wir freuen uns auf dich.
Willkommen sind
Redebegeisterte
Redescheue
Kreative, denen die Werkzeuge zur Kommunikation fehlen
Angestellte/Selbstständige, die besser vor Publikum oder vorm Chef reden wollen
Du kannst bei uns alle aktuellen Herausforderungen trainieren:
Präsenztreffen vor Publikum
Onlinetreffen
Präsentieren
Pitchen
Das Treffen findet hybride statt:
Vor-Ort in der X-GROUP in der Düsseldorfer Str. 76 und via Zoom.
https://is.gd/tU6jVD
Wir freuen uns auf rege Teilnahme und Anmeldung.
***
Der Eintritt ist kostenfrei.
Wir beginnen pünktlich um 19:00 Uhr. Einlass ab 18:45 Uhr.
293697003.Venue: X-GROUP Institut für Gründung, Finanzierung & Geschäftsentwicklung

293610792.Name: Learnings from Building a Fast-Growing Edtech Startup
293610792.Long Description:
Good product management practices enable startups to build and deliver awesome products. At this practical webinar, learn the latest tools and techniques that your company can use to develop a first-class tech solution. Our guest speaker, Sefunmi Osinaike, comes from a product management background in large companies like Apple and Microsoft, but is now building his own edtech startup, which taught him tons of real-life lessons. Join us to hear his personal hands-on experience, ask questions, and network with other entrepreneurs.
❯ What You'll Learn:
How to map out lean product management strategy
How to use data to test and develop your product
How to collaborate with designers, software engineers, and marketers efficiently
❯ Featured Speakers:
Sefunmi Osinaike - Co-founder at Co.Lab: Sefunmi, Forbes 30 Under 30, is the Co-Founder of Co.Lab, an online school that empowers and prepares career switchers for success within the tech industry. Co.Lab specializes in facilitating collaborative, hands-on product development experience for product managers, designers, and software engineers to gain real-world experience. Sefunmi, who started his career as a product manager at companies such as Apple and Microsoft, is also the author of How to Product—a book on transitioning into product management from outside the industry.
❯❯ This is a live, interactive online event, so be sure to RSVP at https://fi.co/e/323855/meetup to receive the Zoom URL to join us live!

293809112.Name: Pitch Lounge: Practice Pitching Your Business Idea to Startup Experts
293809112.Long Description:
Get actionable, instant feedback on your startup
To launch a great startup, it is critical to get feedback on your ideas from entrepreneurs who have been there and done that. First, you'll learn the best practices for creating a concise and compelling elevator pitch. Then, you will have the opportunity to share your pitch with other entrepreneurs, advisors, and investors at virtual tables for instant feedback. Even if you don't want to share your pitch, you can still join to hear other startup ideas and witness how the experts review a pitch.
❯ What You'll Learn:
How to give a concise yet compelling elevator pitch
What investors are looking for in a startup pitch
Specific advice and feedback on your pitch and startup ideas
❯ To get the most out of this Pitch for Feedback event:
Come ready for live video networking
Prepare by starting with your one-sentence pitch. See how it's done using our Madlibs format
Fill out our Elevator Pitch Worksheet
To access all of the networking features of this event, please join using Chrome or Firefox from a desktop or tablet, or download the Airmeet Mobile App.
❯❯ This is a live, interactive online event, so be sure to RSVP at https://fi.co/startupwebinar/16215 to receive the Zoom URL to join us live!

293253059.Long Description:

293733420.Name: How To Set Up Your Financial Model in 5 Steps
293733420.Long Description:
Are you a founder seeking guidance on financial management and planning for your business?
Join us for an exclusive mastermind session, "How To Set Up Your Financial Model in 5 Steps," with Sophia Heinke and Benjamin Kamya, the esteemed experts at Summa Consult. This event is designed to equip you with the knowledge and tools necessary to establish a solid financial model for your venture.
During this engaging session, you'll gain invaluable insights and practical learnings from both industry peers and seasoned professionals. Summa Consult's team of financial experts will share their wealth of knowledge, drawing from their extensive experience working with startups and established businesses alike.
📅 Date: June 7th, 2023
⌚️ Time: 11:00 am - 12:30 pm
By attending this event, you'll have the opportunity to:
1. Discover the key components of an effective financial model.
2. Learn the five crucial steps to set up your financial model.
3. Understand best practices for financial management and planning.
4. Gain insights into common pitfalls and how to avoid them.
5. Engage in interactive discussions with industry peers and experts.
6. Walk away with practical strategies to implement immediately.
Whether you're a new founder or an experienced entrepreneur, this mastermind session is tailored to provide you with actionable steps to enhance your financial decision-making capabilities. Summa Consult's team will be on hand to answer your questions and offer personalized guidance based on your specific business needs.
Don't miss this opportunity to take your financial management skills to the next level. Join us for "How To Set Up Your Financial Model in 5 Steps" and leave with the confidence and knowledge to propel your business forward.
We look forward to seeing you at this insightful event!
S﻿ee you online! ;)
---
The Berlin Founders Fund is financed through funds from the European Union (European Social Fund) and the State of Berlin.
🎟️ If you are a BFF, Skytrain or Haus member you can access this event for free! Check the code you have received to access your ticket!
If you have any doubt contact us on events@siliconallee.com

293509962.Name: Startup Strategy Game: Play your (agile) people & org design
293509962.Long Description:
THE GAME IS ON!
You're founder or team lead of startup and passed the early stage into your growth/expansion phase. Now you need to (re)organize your units, teams, people and roles in a new (agile) way.
Gamify your actual team, project, department or organization design and foresee your individual needs and challenges by playing through your new structure in a very fun way!
Workshop format: 3-6 people
Process: Amongst the participants you will introduce yourselves with your current cases. The group will choose ONE case to play through.
Benefits: Get professional feedback or learn from other cases, get fresh ideas from our peer groups and expand your networks.

293722152.Name: CRO Workshop w/ Host Mike Gojcaj, Founder&Ecommerce Strategist of Mirgo Digital
293722152.Tags: Online Marketing,Pay Per Click,Conversion Optimization,PPC - Paid Search,E-Commerce
293722152.Long Description:
Join us for an interactive virtual CRO workshop led by Mike Gojcaj, Founder and Ecommerce Strategist at Mirgo Digital, on May 22, 2023 at 04:00 PM UTC (12:00 PM EST). During this workshop, Mike will provide attendees with insights and strategies to optimize their Shopify stores for better conversion rates.
Attendees will also have the opportunity to have their Shopify stores reviewed by Mike to identify potential CRO lift opportunities. Don't miss out on this valuable opportunity to learn from a seasoned ecommerce strategist and improve the performance of your online store.
Please register here https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_MlQiwVsEQzSepPOCpJ7fkA#/registration

293421413.Name: Monthly Meetup
293421413.Long Description:
Silicon Allee has been the welcoming committee for Berlin’s newest entrepreneurs, startup founders, and tech talents for over a decade, and our Monthly Meetup is where the community gets together every month.
We've helped companies move to Berlin, developed worldwide partnerships, and produced internationally renowned events in the city.
Looking for great connections? It doesn't matter if you're a new or an expert in Berlin, our doors are open to all the incredibly diverse ecosystems to mingle and make the best out of this morning exchanging knowledge and experience with each other.
DATE
🗓 Tuesday, June 6, 2023
WHERE?
📍At St. Oberholz Café- Berlin's original cool and cozy "tech cafe" centrally located right next to U-Bahn Rosenthaler Platz (🚇 U8 in the heart of Mitte).
🗝 To access the event you will use the coworking entrance at Torstraße on the first floor. You will see Silicon Allee banner in front of the door once you arrive. ;)
THE ENTRY!
🏠 The door to access our Monthly Meetup is now at Torstraße (the door next to the Wrapublic!). The Meetup is indoors, on the first floor! 🔝
⚠️ We ask the Monthly Meetup participants to let the passage on the corridor on the second floor FREE - it gives access to the toilets to all the clients in the Café! Thanks for your understanding and collaboration :) ⚠️
WHAT TIME?
⌚️ 9am - 11am CET
FREE TO ATTEND!
👣 Community spirit - we're ready to help navigate your journey in Berlin's startup community. Learn about our Berlin Founders Fund, receive insider tips and engage in hot topics of conversation. There is always someone interesting in the room :)
🧶 Easy-going flow - there's no agenda. It's all about meeting and connecting with entrepreneurs, tech enthusiasts, investors, business coaches, experts, and folks from the Silicon Allee and Berlin Founders Fund team.
☕️ St. Oberholz is hosting our community for this event and whoever would like to buy coffee and snacks at the Café downstairs is welcome to :)
Don’t you know what’s Haus?
Travis, Co-Founder and MD of Silicon Allee explain in his words what Haus is about and why we made it:
“We received so many requests from people saying they wanted to have access to the same network, resources, education, and expert advice that was previously exclusive to our BFF founders. That’s why we created Haus - the platform that gives everyone access to the same content, community, mentors, and network that was previously exclusive to our BFF founders.” 🚀
Exciting, isn’t it? Welcome to Haus! Click here to apply for it! :D
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to email events@siliconallee.com.
See you there! 😉

293440273.Name: Unternehmer Netzwerk BNI München - Online Session (Zoom)
293440273.Long Description:
Wie läuft das Online Meeting via Zoom ab?
Ab 6:45 Uhr ist ein Zoom Kanal begehbar, dessen ID ich auf Anfrage weitergebe.
Um 7:00 Uhr ist die letzte Möglichkeit beizutreten. Dann wird die Gruppe für einige Minuten in Network Sessions von 3-4 Personen gesplittet, um sich besser unterhalten zu können.
Ab ca. 7:10 Uhr findet ein kurzer Schulungsblock statt, worin es um Persönlichkeitsentwicklung und andere Soft-Skills geht. Danach stellt sich jedes Mitglied (22-25) bis zu 60 Sekunden vor und erklärt sein Geschäft und was es sucht (bestimmte Kunden, Kontakt zu einer Branche, Dienstleistungen, Mitarbeiter usw.).
Gegen Ende findet das Netzwerken nochmals in kleineren Gruppen statt. Selbstverständlich kann jederzeit der Chat benutzt werden, um Kontakte herzustellen.
Für den Zoom Link wird folgende ID benötigt: 370-618-8215

293410042.Name: 12MIN.ME | SUSTAIN 🌱 #5 | BERLIN
293410042.Long Description:
Dear 12min.me tribe,
Mark your calendars for the next 12min.me event and we're switching it up to TUESDAYS! 📆
➡️ Tuesday, June 20, 2023 - 6:45 PM
For those of you, who are still new to the game: We are the community for all sustainability enthusiasts who want to get inspired and connect with other people who are passionate about driving change towards a more sustainable world 💚
Our success formula: Combining 3 inspiring movers & shakers from the field of sustainability, a passionate and curious crowd and our well proven format:
12 min presentation
12 min Q&A
12 min networking
... rinse and repeat 😉
Because we don't want you to waste your time!
We are thrilled to announce our first amazing speaker:
Daniel Rieber- Co-Founder & Managing Partner @https://www.wevolve.company/:
„A Sustainable Future Begins With Mindful Self-Leadership“
Moving toward a more sustainable world requires not only structural change, but also a new way of being. Developing the necessary awareness requires inner work, and mindful self-leadership is a key skill. It helps us stay centered in times of change and connect with ourselves and the world in a compassionate way. It gives us the tools to be in the here and now and to shift from autopilot to self-efficacy
Register for free, join our green community and stay tuned for yet another stellar speaker line-up ✨
The event will take place over at our friends from https://motionlab.berlin/de/, Bouchéstraße 12/Halle 20, 12435 Berlin, start 19:12 sharp (arrival from 18:45). It is a 15 min walk from Treptower Park SBahn station, it can be a bit tricky to find. Make sure you enter via Jordanstraße 🙂
Please RSVP via Meetup to confirm your attendance.
We are looking forward to making this another fantastic event with YOU.
Lots of green love 💚
Your 12MIN.ME Berlin crew

293486072.Name: EO Accelerator Info Session
293486072.Long Description:
The mission of the EO Accelerator is to empower entrepreneurs with the
tools, community and accountability to aggressively grow and master their business.
We are pleased that you are interested in our program and hope you were able to get a first impression on our website www.eoaccelerator.ch. Our program is aimed at all young entrepreneurs who want to catapult their business to the next level and already have more than $250,000 in revenue or have received $1 million in funding.
In order to tell you more about the program, we would like to invite you to one of our virtual info sessions. We look forward to getting to know you.
Please register on Eventbrite, a registration on Meetup is not sufficient.
About EO:
The Entrepreneurs' Organisation (EO) is an exclusive community of successful founders with over $1 million in revenue. The local chapters run confidential forums, organize events and provide executive education in order to support entrepreneurs in business, private, and family life.

293756982.Name: Build your Startup now, Pay later.
293756982.Long Description:
S﻿tartups from venture studios perform significantly better than normal VC-funded startups. They reach funding rounds faster and have higher success chances. This is mainly due to the professional execution, which reduces operational risks and accelerates the time to market.
K﻿APSLY Ventures democratises the venture studio model, by
building a service network that covers all needs for healthtech startups

H﻿ow to get support from service providers

Optimizing Cash-flow
Advantages and disadvantages of service-for-equity
Best practices
H﻿ow to work with KAPSLY and its partners
Bring your co-founders.

293565653.Name: We analyze and discuss a product positioning LIVE for a startup product
293565653.Long Description:
Promote yourselves with your products or suggest a product from a startup! From the suggestions, we will select a product for which we will conduct the agenda below together during the online event. Please submit your proposals to hello@repattern.de in a timely manner.
Please register as early as possible, as it may take up to 30 minutes for our system to send the invitation link.
Agenda / Methods and Tools / Timeboxing:
Introduction - 10 minutes
- Presentation of methods and purpose
Target audience analysis - 15 minutes
- Which target audiences are ideal for the product?
- What assumptions do you have about the target audiences?
Value Proposition Canvas - 20 minutes
- For the most important target audience, we will work on assumptions regarding "Pains" and "Gains."
- We will discuss possible value propositions.
Claims - 45 minutes
- Based on the value proposition, we will develop possible claims.
- We will define important keywords and terms.
Analysis - 10 minutes
- We will compare the work done with existing landing pages and/or advertisements, product materials.
Lessons Learned - 10 minutes
- From the process, we will go through specific learnings related to the product.
- From the event, we will discuss general learnings and takeaways.
Q&A + Feedback round - 10 minutes
Data Privacy Notice: By participating in the meetup, you agree that we process the data you provide through Meetup in the video conferencing tool Microsoft Teams. Please refer to our privacy policy regarding Microsoft 365: https://www.repattern.de/privacy

293165554.Name: Der richtige Aufbau einer DevSecOps-Kultur und -Infrastruktur
293165554.Long Description:
❗️🤔Wie geht Sicherheit in der Softwareentwicklung?
🙌 Lasst es uns zusammen herausfinden!
Nimm an einem informativen Meetup zum Thema DevSecOps teil, bei dem wir über die Bedeutung von Sicherheit in der Softwareentwicklung und im Betrieb diskutieren.
Unsere Speaker, werden live in Berlin, Wilhelmine -Gemberg-Weg 11 ihr Wissen und ihre Erfahrung mit uns teilen, die sie aus ihrer Arbeit für die IBM Deutschland GmbH gewonnen haben.
Unsere Agenda:
18:00 Uhr: Einlass
18.30 Uhr: Begrüßung & Vorstellung
19: 00 Uhr: Jasmin Mair über die Bedeutung des Aufbaus einer DevSecOps-Kultur
19:40 Uhr: Thomas Schwärzl über die Implementierung von DevSecOps-Praktiken in einer CI/CD-Umgebung
20:30 Uhr: FAQ & Pizza
Unsere Themen:
👉 Jasmin Mair, Data and Application Security Services Leader der IBM Security - DACH, wird über die Bedeutung des Aufbaus einer DevSecOps-Kultur sprechen, die Sicherheit in den Softwareentwicklungs-Lifecycle integriert.
Dabei werden Themen wie Security Enablement, Bedrohungsmodellierung, Compliance und Sicherheitsanforderungen im Fokus stehen.
Neben all diesen spannenden Fakten vermittelt sie uns neben viel Wissen auch die Best Practices für den Aufbau eines sicheren Softwareentwicklungsansatzes von Anfang an.
👉 Thomas Schwärzl, Senior Stack Technical Specialist, wird die Implementierung von DevSecOps-Praktiken in einer CI/CD-Umgebung diskutieren.
Er wird uns mit in die Themenwelt der Sicherheitsautomatisierung, des Compliance Managements und der Integration von Sicherheitstests in eine Continuous Delivery Pipeline nehmen.
Anhand von praktischen Beispielen für den Einsatz von DevSecOps-Tools und -Praktiken in einer modernen Softwareentwicklungsumgebung können alle Teilnehmer von unseren Speakern einen echten Mehrwert erwarten.
Lerne von erfahrenen DevSecOps-Experten und tausche dich mit anderen Experten aus.
🚀Ob Entwickler, Sicherheitsexperte oder Administrator, wir freuen uns, euch am 15.06.23 auf unserem Meetup zu sehen!
Unsere Speaker:
🌐 1. Jasmin Mair:
Jasmin ist eine erfahrene Beraterin für Daten- und Anwendungssicherheit und arbeitet derzeit als Data and Application Security Services Leader in DACH bei IBM Security.
Sie verfügt über umfangreiche Erfahrung in der Organisation und Umsetzung von sicheren Entwicklungsprogrammen, der Einführung von DevSecOps und der Implementierung eines sicheren SDLC.
Vor ihrer jetzigen Rolle war Jasmin in einer Reihe von Positionen bei IBM Security tätig. Als Managing Consultant im Bereich Application Security leitete sie mehrere Projekte zur Entwicklung von Sicherheitskonzepten, Bedrohungsmodellierung und zur automatisierten Abdeckung von Compliance-Anforderungen.
Dabei arbeitete sie mit einer Vielfalt von AppSec-Tools und erwarb fundierte Kenntnisse in den Bereichen Sicherheitshärtung, Cloud-, Container- und Infrastruktursicherheit sowie IAM.
Sie arbeitete auch als Agile Consultant & Career Coach bei IBM, wo sie Kunden bei agilen und DevOps Transformationen beriet und eine kleine Geschäftseinheit mit 10 Mitarbeitern im Bereich Cognitive&Analytics leitete. Auch wertvolle Startup-Erfahrung erwarb sie bei Widerun, wo sie Scrum als Projektmanagementmethode einführte und verschiedene Teile des Produkts effektiv koordinierte.
Social Media:
https://twitter.com/jasschien
https://www.linkedin.com/in/jasminmair/
🌐 2. Thomas Schwärzl
Thomas Schwärzl ist einer der erfahrensten Technologieexperten mit umfassender Expertise in den Bereichen Cloud-Lösungen, DevOps und Infrastrukturmanagement.
Er verfügt über mehr als 20 Jahre Berufserfahrung und arbeitet derzeit als zStack Technical Specialist bei der IBM Deutschland GmbH.
Er ist spezialisiert auf das Design und die Implementierung von Multi-Hybrid-Cloud-Architekturen und verfügt über umfangreiche Kenntnisse in den Bereichen CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code und Cloud Security.
Thomas hat eine Leidenschaft für Technologie und teilt sein Wissen gerne mit anderen.
Für das Deutsche Forschungsnetz, den Deutschen Städtetag und Universitäten in ganz Deutschland hat er bereits zahlreiche Vorträge und Präsentationen gehalten. Er ist Mitglied des Kernteams der Architecture Community of Practice und im Technical Expert Council von IBM vertreten. Außerdem ist er leidenschaftlicher Triathlet, Gamer und Sportfan.
Social Media:
https://twitter.com/tschwaerzl
https://linkedin.com/in/tschwaerzl
https://www.schwaerzl.net

293815576.Name: Real Estate Investing Master Class - Real Estate Investing Basics
293815576.Tags: Cashflow,Entrepreneur Networking,Women Entrepreneurs,Professional Development,Beginner Real Estate Investing
293815576.Long Description:
***Kindly register in the Eventbrite link below***
https://event.webinarjam.com/register/145/z336xiwx
Are you ready to get started investing in real estate? Join us for this free information session
## About this event
Did you know that...
50% of people are living paycheck to paycheck
31% say they already don’t make enough to meet all their financial obligations.
32% of people between 45 and 64 are nearing retirement without any savings
25% of retired people are still in debt with mortgages and consumer debt
## These statistics are shocking and we truly believe our entire population is in a crisis!
Why do these statistics exist....especially amongst working professionals?
To make matters even worse, did you know...
Hundreds of Thousands of people are stuck in the sandwich generation caring for their kids and parents, stretching not only their finances but their time!
The average university graduate finishes school with more than $26,000 in student debt and it takes them an average of 10 years to pay it off
Millions of Millennials are locked out of home ownership because of the rising home prices, debt loads, and inability to save for a down payment.
### Don't be a statistic!
It is time to take charge and start doing things differently!!!
Join us for this Free 60-minute training class where we will show you why Real Estate is the #1 wealth builder and how you can start building wealth today!
As Wealth Builders, we’ve become really good at what we do and have helped ourselves and over 1000 people across the globe take control of their investments and create freedom in their lives!
11 years ago, we knew we needed to build wealth and create freedom in our lives...and maybe some of these points will resonate with you:
"I needed to create extra income so I can be a stay-at-home parent"
"I was concerned with my retirement fund performance and was nervous about the next crash"
"I wanted more freedom and flexibility in my life"
"I wasn’t sure if my pension was still going to be there when it was my turn to retire"
"What would I do if I lost my job and how long could we survive on our income?"
"Inflation was outpacing my raise at work and we were falling behind on our debts"
"Sometimes I just wanted to take 1 extra vacation each year"
"How am I going to pay for the big ticket items in life.....having children, funding their education, retirement, and caring for elderly parents?"
All of these were a concern but we faced a BIGGER problem.
We couldn’t find the answers we were looking for.
### How could we do things differently?
And this is what we will be discussing at this FREE 60-minute seminar.
In this class:
*We will share our story, our struggles, and how we started
*We’ll show you 3 different ways you can start building wealth TODAY!
*We’ll share exactly how YOU can get started TODAY!
*This is a previously recorded event.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The RP Team

293688586.Name: A Beginners Tutorial of Investing on The Stock Market
293688586.Tags: Investing for Retirement,Stock Investing,Stock Market,Stock Trading,Investing
293688586.Long Description:
Discover the secrets to successful stock market investing! Are you intrigued by the idea of making your money work for you? Worried about the risks involved? Well, fear not! Stocks have proven to be the most effective and least risky investment option throughout history.
Now is the perfect time to unlock the potential of the stock market and learn how to maximize your returns. Investing in stocks may seem daunting, reserved only for the pros, but with the right knowledge, it can be surprisingly simple.
If you're a novice investor or considering reentering the market, mark this event as a MUST on your calendar! Don't miss out on the opportunity to gain valuable insights.
Let's talk about the returns. Ultimately, people invest in the stock market to make money, and when done correctly, you can expect an average growth of 7-10% over the long term. Picture this: £10,000 invested now with an average growth of 7% would blossom into £20,000 in just 10 years. That's a remarkable return compared to what you'd achieve with a traditional savings account!
Sure, property investment often grabs attention, but it comes with tying up your money and hefty maintenance costs. On the other hand, stocks are quick, easy, and inexpensive to trade. That's why they're known as "liquid assets" – offering you flexibility and potential profits.
We're thrilled to have Jonathan, a Chartered Accountant with over 45 years of stock market experience, as your host for this event. From his early investment days to learning from top investors worldwide, Jonathan's background provides him with the best of both worlds. His infectious enthusiasm for the subject and passion for sharing his acquired knowledge make him the perfect guide.
Don't delay, as spots are limited! Jonathan's events tend to be over-subscribed, so seize the opportunity and register NOW.
Get ready to embark on a journey of wealth creation through stock market investing!

293690979.Name: Brauch ich wirklich eine Berunfähigkeitsversicherung? 🤔
293690979.Long Description:
Mit dem Geld, das wir verdienen, konsumieren wir und bezahlen alles was wir für unser Leben wollen und brauchen. Jeden Monat aufs Neue. Dazu kommen dann noch unsere persönlichen Ziele und Wünsche, für die wir einen Teil des Gehalts zurücklegen und rentabel investieren. Unser monatliches Einkommen finanziert also unseren Lebensstandard.
Doch was ist, wenn das eigene Gehalt auf einmal weniger wird, oder gar wegfällt? Was passiert wenn man gesundheitlich nicht mehr im Stande ist, seinem Job nachzugehen? Wie sichert man sein Einkommen ab? Wie trägt man die laufenden Kosten?
Auf diese vielen Fragen, scheint es eine vermeintlich einfach Antwort zu geben: Die Berufsunfähigkeitsversicherung. Aber stimmt das?
Um diese & noch weitere Fragezeichen aufzulösen, sprechen wir bei unserem Event ganz einfach und verständlich über folgende Punkte:
Was genau ist eine Berufsunfähigkeitsversicherung und in welchen Fällen sichert sie dich ab?
Welche Leistungen erhalte ich vom Staat und Arbeitgeber
Für wen ist eine Absicherung sinnvoll?
Welche Bausteine benötige ich unbedingt bei einer Absicherung, welche nicht?
Was mache ich wenn ich aus gesundheitlichen Gründen keine Absicherung mehr bekommen kann?
Das und vieles mehr werden wir in gewohnter Finanzcafé-Atmosphäre mit viel Witz, Charme & Aha-Momenten durchgehen. Danach seid ihr bestens informiert und könnt eine für euch sinnvolle Entscheidung treffen.
Wir freuen uns auf ein tolles Finanzcafé mit dir!

293687799.Name: Learn How You Can Invest Successfully On The Stock Market
293687799.Tags: Investing for Retirement,Stock Investing,Stock Market,Stock Trading,Investing
293687799.Long Description:
Should you invest in the stock market?
Would you like to know how?
Investing in stocks may sound complicated and only for the professional investor but with the right inside knowledge it is actually very simple.
If you have never invested before or are thinking about getting back into the market - this event is a MUST!
Ultimately people invest in the stock market to make money and done correctly you can make on average 7-10% over the long term. To put that into perspective £10,000 invested now at an average growth of 7% would be worth £20,000 in 10 years - a lot better than you will achieve with a savings account!
People worry about the risk involved in the stock market but historically stocks have been the most effective and least risky option, bar none, for investors.
You hear a lot about property investment but it ties up your money and there can be a lot of costs involved in maintenance and when you come to sell. Stocks on the other hand are quick, easy, and inexpensive to trade which is why they are often referred to as 'liquid assets'.
I am really pleased to have been able to get Jonathan to agree to do this presentation and am sure that you will get massive benefit from it. Register for the event today and start learning how you can make money by investing in stocks NOW!
Who Is Jonathan Horrocks?
Jonathan is your host for the event. His background really gives him the best of both worlds being a Chartered Accountant and somebody with over 45 years of investment experience in the stock market. He started investing at an early age and went on to train with some of the top investors in the world.
His enthusiasm for the subject is infectious and he loves nothing better than sharing his acquired knowledge, teaching people how to invest the correct way.
Places are limited and Johnathan's events have been known to be over-subscribed so register NOW before you miss out!

## Und Energie folgt der Aufmerksamkeit!
###
### Hast Du Lust auf eine neue Fokusausrichtung?
### H﻿ast Du Lust auf noch mehr Leichtigkeit mit Geld, Business und Investments?
### Dann komm vom 03.06. bis 05.06.2023 in den kostenfreien 3-Tage Booster für Money Energy & Mindset!
Ich habe 2014 eine klasse Methodik gefunden mit der ich damals endlich wieder in die Leichtigkeit gekommen bin. Alles war schwer. Das kannte ich so nicht. Du kommst in meine geschlossene Facebook Gruppe "Finanzielle Leichtigkeit & Freiheit"

Fragen öffnen und Fragen steuern die Aufmerksamkeit. Aufmerksamkeit gibt Momentum.
A﻿lle erfolgreichen Menschen leben intuitiv aus der Frage heraus.

B﻿isherige Teilnehmer fühlen sich grundsätzlich besser, fröhlicher und leichter
D﻿ein Fokus ist neu ausgerichtet auf das, was du wirklich möchtest

D﻿u realisierst deine Manifestationskraft

Deine C﻿ornelia

In addition, you will have the opportunity to network with others looking for a Co-founder through fun group networking, and one-to-one sessions.
It is not required, but to get the most out of this co-founder networking event, we recommend that you come ready for live video networking and prepare by visiting our Guide to Find a Co-Founder . You can also use this Co-Founder Networking Worksheet prior to joining the event.
To access all of the networking features of this webinar, please join using Chrome or Firefox from a desktop or tablet, or download the Airmeet Mobile App.
❯ Who Should Attend
Anyone who is launching or thinking about launching a Silicon Valley startup
Anyone looking for a co-founder and/or looking to learn about building a co-founder relationship
Anyone interested in finding opportunities with startups
❯ What is the Agenda
Introduction
Short presentation on best practices for finding and formalizing a Co-founder
Group and one-to-one speed networking with others looking for a Co-founder
❯ What Will You Accomplish
Meet startup enthusiasts and experts from around the world
Shortlist individuals that can be a Co-founder
❯❯ This is a live, interactive online event, so be sure to RSVP at https://fi.co/startupwebinar/16190 to receive the Zoom URL to join us live!

293809578.Name: Pitch Lounge: Practice Pitching Your Business Idea to Startup Experts
293809578.Long Description:
Get actionable, instant feedback on your startup
To launch a great startup, it is critical to get feedback on your ideas from entrepreneurs who have been there and done that. First, you'll learn the best practices for creating a concise and compelling elevator pitch. Then, you will have the opportunity to share your pitch with other entrepreneurs, advisors, and investors at virtual tables for instant feedback. Even if you don't want to share your pitch, you can still join to hear other startup ideas and witness how the experts review a pitch.
❯ What You'll Learn:
How to give a concise yet compelling elevator pitch
What investors are looking for in a startup pitch
Specific advice and feedback on your pitch and startup ideas
❯ To get the most out of this Pitch for Feedback event:
Come ready for live video networking
Prepare by starting with your one-sentence pitch. See how it's done using our Madlibs format
Fill out our Elevator Pitch Worksheet
To access all of the networking features of this event, please join using Chrome or Firefox from a desktop or tablet, or download the Airmeet Mobile App.
❯❯ This is a live, interactive online event, so be sure to RSVP at https://fi.co/startupwebinar/16215 to receive the Zoom URL to join us live!

293659276.Name: FREE! How to Pitch to Investors and Get Funded /Angel Investor Gary Jinks
293659276.Long Description:
This is an online event. Participation is 100% online.
Participants who have registered via Eventbrite will be emailed the login link right before the start of the event.
Participants can be located anywhere in the world!
This event is FREE to attend.
A "YES" RSVP on our meetup site does not confirm your reservation.
Space is limited.
In order to participate, you must register here:
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/free-how-to-pitch-to-investors-and-get-fundedangel-investor-gary-jinks-tickets-119696456323
Hurry! Slots are limited!
Almost all entrepreneurs are seeking funding and want to get funded. However, most entrepreneurs have never taken an idea to market or raised private investment or run a startup or had a successful exit.
Our goal is to accelerate your progress, reduce your risk, and if all works out, share in the success.
This webinar sets the stage and gives you a strategic understanding of the successful startup business model as well as why most startups fail. This will help you understand the critical path and provides the foundation for successfully launching your startup. This webinar is also a great opportunity for entrepreneurs already looking for funding to get an investor view on why you may not be closing the deals.
By attending this webinar, you can begin your journey, get your questions answered, gajn insight from a veteran Silicon Valley investor and become part of a global ecosystem.
Agenda
Why Investors See Your Business Different than You Do
Why the Startup Model is Different
How the Funding Process Works Today and How It has Changed
What You Need Before You Pitch to Investors
Pitching and Pitch Decks
Talk Like a CEO; How to Think Strategically
What is Important to Investors
Open Forum: Ask an Investor!
About the Speaker:
Gary Jinks is the founder and managing director of South Valley Angels and an executive level leader with deep expertise and extensive track record developing high yield innovation ecosystems and building up high growth exit focused start-up ventures. Gary has created, transformed and launched innovation in Silicon Valley his entire career, from combat vehicles to lifestyle apps. Gary founded GLJ Group in 2005 and has led engineering, strategic direction and business development for corporate clients resulting in over $300M in new business. In 2010 he shifted complete focus to the startup community, advising over 400 startups, working with the top incubators and investors in the Silicon Valley, launching innovation centers and developing regional ecosystems around the globe. He is a regular speaker, evangelist and lead executive adviser helping clients formulate custom strategies and implementing the next evolution of the startup model, “Startup 3.0 Precision Innovation”.
If you have questions about the content of Gary's presentation, please email him at:
gary@southvalleyangels.com

293452616.Name: Final Demo Day Event - Trans Atlantic Angel Conference 3 Program
293452616.Tags: Venture Capital,Professional Networking,Startup Businesses,Lean Startup,Angel Investing
293452616.Long Description:
The Trans Atlantic Angel Conference is a "learning by doing" program where new Angel Investors learn about Angel Investing by doing an Angel Investment.
Across 3 months, 21 Angel Investors together reviewed 60+ companies who shared company financials, business strategies, customer references, and operating plans. We held individual and group investor discussions, where we evaluated, selected, debated about, and did meaningful due diligence.
This Demo / Pitch Night is the end of the program. It is an exclusive virtual reception during which participating companies have the opportunity to pitch to an audience of entrepreneurs, mentors, investors, and community members.
The 5 finalist companies will present. The Due Diligence teams will outline what they explored in the process of due diligence. And then the Angel investors will select a company to make an investment in. The audience is invited to also vote for an Audience Award.
Many Angel Groups will be invited to attend. Many will be there. There will be time to network and engage with other attendees. This is an online event.
T﻿he finalist startups are
🔵 Evitado Technologies
Evitado is an automation platform for automating airport operations. It provides algorithms for autonomous movement of all assets on the ground and insights for real-time decision-making in operations. The first product is a collision warning system solving an industry wide problem of aircraft ground collisions. This serves as the foundation for our platform collecting the data to build numerous additional use cases. ✈️ https://evitado.io/
🔵 Marlow
Marlow is the first-ever lubricated tampon, consisting of organic cotton with a plant-based applicator and an all-natural lubricant. They address the huge gap of women, (1 in 3) who experience vaginal dryness, resulting in discomfort using the existing producst in market. 🩸
🔵 MeCo Diagnostics
A first-in-class predictive biomarker, which tests to harness antifibrotic drugs for cancer metastasis prevention. It aims to reduce breast and prostate cancer burden in patients before surgery, leading to higher rates of lifelong remission, by bringing targetted therapy costs >10X lower. ⚕️
🔵Tuft
Tuft is the UK’s first Pet SaaS for finding, booking and reviewing your local pet services. Their innovative technology is disrupting the pet care industry and brings a new level of convenience and efficiency to pet owners and service providers everywhere. 🐕
🔵Undesert Corporation
Undesert's patented technology uses available underground salt water or sea water to produce pure water, irrigates forests in plentiful unused empty desert to capture atmospheric CO2 in gigaton quantities, halting or reversing Global Warming. 🌎

293099700.Long Description:

Being a founder tough!
You're your own cheerleader, you’re the boss, the marketer, the sales department, the tea maker. What you need is other founders to support you.

293610078.Name: Angel 101 - An Overview of Angel Investing
293610078.Long Description:
Are you intrigued by angel investing but unsure where to start? This Masterclass is tailored just for you, providing a comprehensive introduction to the exciting realm of angel investing.
We will cover three key areas:
1️⃣ Introduction to Angel Investing:
- Define what angel investing is and its vital role in supporting early-stage startups.
- Explore the benefits and risks associated with angel investing.
- Discover the motivations and goals driving angel investors.
2️⃣ Angel Investing Process:
- Walk through the essential steps involved in angel investing, from sourcing opportunities to due diligence and negotiation.
- Learn how angel investors evaluate startups, including assessing the team, market potential, and financials.
- Understand the significance of conducting thorough due diligence and establishing clear investment criteria.
3️⃣ Portfolio Strategy and Risk Management:
- Unlock the concept of portfolio diversification and its crucial role in angel investing.
- Explore various strategies for building a balanced and diversified angel investment portfolio.
- Discover effective risk management techniques, including setting investment limits, ongoing monitoring, and potential exit strategies.
T﻿he event is suitable both for current angel investors and for professionals who are considering angel investing.

293616051.Long Description:

It's finally time to meet with someone like you.

No Selling, No MLM/Network Marketing.
We speak 100% English!

293426651.Name: Faith Driven Entrepreneur Germany: A 8-Week Meetup Series
293426651.Long Description:
Are you a faith-driven entrepreneur? Or are you currently building a company, while seeking ways to integrate your faith into your professional life?
Join us in an 8-week Faith Driven Entrepreneur Meetup, designed to empower and inspire connect like-minded individuals, share experiences, and grow in their entrepreneurial and spiritual journey.
Each week, we will dive into a different topic that combines entrepreneurial skills and spiritual principles, creating a strong foundation for faith-driven business ventures. By participating in interactive discussions and activities, you will see real-life cases of how faith-driven entrepreneurs navigate the challenges of entrepreneurship while staying true to their beliefs.
Topics covered in this meetup series include:
Call to Create: Embrace your God-given talents and passions to make a meaningful impact.
Purpose-Driven Business: Align your business with your spiritual values and purpose.
Faith, Work, Life Balance: Discover strategies for maintaining harmony between your personal, professional, and spiritual life.
Work with Excellence: Explore what level of excellence do you need to deliver exceptional products and services that honor your faith.
Faithful vs. Willful: Learn how to rely on divine guidance while taking purposeful action in your business.
Time:
6:30 pm, Every Thursday, German time
From June 8th to July 27th
NOTE!!
Please sign up through the official Faith Driven Website, so you receive all the materials needed in advance:
https://groups.faithdrivenentrepreneur.org/app/groups/556a0862-8d15-4e78-8086-cd6f822ba539

293489487.Name: Be better organised as an entrepreneur
293489487.Long Description:
Are you an entrepreneur struggling to keep up with the demands of your business? Do you feel like you're constantly putting out fires and never really making progress? It's time to take a step back and reassess your approach.
Led by executive and organisational coach, Amelie Chartton, this event is designed to help you optimise your workflow, become more efficient, and stay energised in your leadership role. Amelie will help you analyse and refocus on what really matters.
As an entrepreneur herself, Amelie understands the challenges that come with running multiple businesses, juggling numerous projects, and travelling to different countries. She'll share her years of experience in setting goals, creating routines, and maintaining discipline to reach the life she wants without burning out.
During this webinar, you'll gain clarity on the routines, habits, and distractions that are slowing you down. You'll learn how to identify where you're spending your energy, where your burdens lie, and where your stress is coming from.
And you'll walk away with practical tips and strategies for being a more effective leader, without sacrificing your own well-being.
Remember, the success of your team or company rests on your shoulders, but it's important to take care of yourself too.
Sign up today and learn how to start leading with confidence and self-discipline.
Please note
All our Meetup Events are FREE of charge and this Meetup Group wholeheartedly supports Meetup policies and principles and never makes financial assurances and/or guarantees.

293609541.Name: Unleashing the Power of Social Entrepreneurs: Sofia Breitholtz, Reach for Change
293609541.Long Description:
Are you a social entrepreneur or planning to start a social venture or initiative?
Welcome to our fireside chat with Sofia Breitholtz, CEO of Reach for Change - a global impact organization which empowers social entrepreneurs to develop innovative solutions that improve the lives of children and youth.
In this fireside chat we discuss:
⭐️ What is social entrepreneurship - do we have a common definition?
⭐️ Where should you start as a social entrepreneur - what are the building blocks of a social venture?
⭐️ How easy or hard it is to set up social ventures - what do you need to know about social entrepreneurship ecosystem?
⭐️ What happens after you have set up your dream social venture - how do you scale or find support for it?
⭐️ How do you stay strong in terms of financial- and mental-health as a social entrepreneur?
⭐️ How Reach for Change helps social entrepreneurs build impactful solutions? 
⭐️ Why has Reach for Change chosen Children & Youth as their primary focus?
⭐️ Where are they on their journey to tenfold their impact by 2030 and thus minimize inequality, poverty and climate effects around the world?
Sofia has a passion for connecting people and resources through building partnerships, we will also be discussing how should social entrepreneurs and ecosystems be thinking about collaborations.
The discussion will be moderated by Naimul Abd - serial impact entrepreneur and Regional Director Nordics at Startup Grind.
Agenda
---
Speaker
Sofia Breitholtz - Reach for Change (CEO)
Sofia Breitholtz has a passion for connecting people and resources through building partnerships to solve global challenges in an innovative way. Sofia is the CEO of Reach for Change, an organisation that supports social entrepreneurs working to scale innovative solutions for children and young people. Reach for Change has supported over 1200 social enterprises in eighteen different countries.…
Hosted By
Naimul Abd, Regional Director Nordics Startup Grind
Startup and ecosystems specialist, impact entrepreneur and venture-builder, and a career marketing director and consultant - Naimul Abd has worked across several business verticals, advised dozens of multinational companies, built high-growth businesses and consulting organizations, and is actively involved in startup and impact ecosystem in Stockholm. Currently a business advisor at Coompanion Stockholm (a Startup Grind Stockholm partner) - he coaches more than 500 startup founders annually, is responsible for partner relations, and organizes dozens of startup events every year. He is also building an early-stage startup portfolio through his venture-builder Globalities. Naimul believes in the power of imagination and sees startup founders as problem solvers for the world. He loves to make music in his free time and some of his work is available on Spotify and other online stores.
---
Global Partner
Microsoft Teams (https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-for-home)
Communities in Microsoft Teams brings everyone together in one place. Engage in community discussions, share files and photos, join video calls, and plan events. No more switching between apps to connect and get things done.
Partners
Reach for Change (https://reachforchange.org/)
Reach for Change is an international non-profit founded in Sweden. Our vision is a world where all children and youth reach their full potential. We're working towards this vision by unleashing the power of local social entrepreneurs and enabling them to go from ideas to innovative solutions and sustainable organizations.
The Park (https://thepark.se/)
The Park is a personal and creative coworking community with space for all types of people, companies and organizations in Stockholm:
Magnus Ladulåsgatan 1, 118 65 Stockholm
Hälsingegatan 49, 113 31 Stockholm
Hammarbyterrassen 3, 120 30 Stockholm
Årstaängsvägen 21C, 117 43 Stockholm
Founder Institute Nordics (https://fi.co/nordics)
Founder Institute is the world’s largest pre-seed accelerator based out of Silicon Valley. Founder Institute Sweden offers a world-leading acceleration program to founders. Apply here: https://fi.co/apply/nordics
Brim Global AB (https://www.brim.global/)
Brim is the world's first brand-powered impact platform channeling more than half a trillion dollars in ad spend to Agenda 2030.
Founders Live Nordics (https://www.founderslive.com/)
Founders Live Nordics is part of the global Founders Live network: a global platform that connects you to the people, resources, capital, and exposure you need to truly become a rockstar.
---
Startup Grind is a global startup community designed to educate, inspire, and connect entrepreneurs. We host monthly events in more than 600 cities and 125+ countries featuring successful local founders, innovators, educators and investors who share personal stories and lessons learned on the road to building great companies. Our monthly fireside chat interviews, startup mixers and annual conferences provide ample opportunities to connect with amazing startups and the people behind them, tap into a strong support network, form meaningful connections and gain inspiration for the startup journey ahead. For more information visit StartupGrind.com or follow us on twitter @StartupGrind.
---
Complete your event RSVP here: https://www.startupgrind.com/events/details/startup-grind-stockholm-presents-unleashing-the-power-of-social-entrepreneurs-sofia-breitholtz-reach-for-change/.

292273873.Name: Start-up, entrepreneur, chef d’entreprise : développez votre activité
292273873.Tags: Online Marketing,Black Entrepreneurs,Small Business Marketing Strategy,Entrepreneurship,Women Entrepreneurs
292273873.Long Description:
Vous êtes une start-up, un entrepreneur, un chef d’entreprise.
En tant qu’entrepreneur, le développement de votre activité représente un enjeu majeur. Vous souhaitez vous développer facilement mais la réalité s’avère plus laborieuse :
3% des personnes qui réussissent leur développement d’entreprise
Le webinaire vous permettra de :
Découvrir les notions importantes et les 7 ressources d'un entrepreneur,
Créer un produit d'appel et un appel à l’action pour faire venir vos prospects,
Connaitre les prix psychologiques d’une offre haut de gamme,
Créer une offre haut de gamme que vos clients vont acheter.
Durant 1 heure, Matthieu, l’organisateur des matinées de l’entrepreneur partagera avec vous :
Des stratégies marketing qui fonctionnent,
Des techniques commerciales pour développer votre activité,
Des exemples concrets et illustrés.
Nous répondrons à toutes vos questions durant le webinaire.
Un rendez-vous conseil de 60 minutes vous sera offert à l’issue du webinaire.
Pour compléter votre inscription gratuite au webinaire, veuillez cliquer sur ce lien de l'événement pour consigner vos coordonnées sur notre page.
IMPORTANT : Les informations de connexion au webinaire sont transmises directement dans l'email de confirmation Eventbrite.

293301968.Name: Entrepreneur : gérer son énergie après un épisode d'épuisement professionnel
293301968.Long Description:
Vous êtes entrepreneur ou vous souhaitez vous lancer dans un projet entrepreneurial. Vous hésitez car vous avez avez fait un burn out.
Après la présentation d'une cartographie des compétences et aptitudes à entreprendre, nous vous proposons de réagir et d'échanger sans tabous ni jugement : votre histoire, vos ressources, vos questions, vos craintes pour mener votre projet plus sereinement.
La "gestion de soi et de son énergie" est fonction de son histoire et de son fonctionnement : comment éviter un surinvestissement "improductif" tout en développant son entreprise ?
Les séances seront animées par Sylvie Serre, entrepreneuse, co-fondatrice avec Sandrine Fabre Rubinstein de 600 phenix
Toutes les deux sont consultantes en reconstruction Post Burn-Out (modèle RPBO) et partenaire de BCAE (bilan des compétences et aptitudes à entreprendre). Elles sont formées et certifiées aux 2 modèles.
Pour recevoir le lien de connexion, merci de confirmer votre participation en cliquant sur ce lien.
Pour en savoir plus et nous contacter :
http://www.600phenix.com

293342344.Name: Devenir mandataire immobilier auto-entrepreneur : les clés pour réussir
293342344.Long Description:
Vous souhaitez vous lancer dans l'immobilier en tant que mandataire auto-entrepreneur mais vous ne savez pas par où commencer ? Vous êtes déjà mandataire immobilier en auto-entreprise mais vous souhaitez améliorer vos résultats ?
Ce webinar est fait pour vous ! 📱
La Maison Des Mandataires vous donnera les clés pour réussir en tant que mandataire immobilier auto-entrepreneur. 🏡
Dans ce webinar, nous aborderons différents points clés pour réussir dans ce métier :
- Comment se lancer,
- Comment prospecter efficacement,
- Comment optimiser sa visibilité sur internet,
- Comment gérer sa comptabilité...
Nous répondrons également à toutes vos questions en direct ! 💡
📆 Rejoignez-nous le lundi 05 Juin à 12h30 et ne manquez pas cette opportunité pour perfectionner votre activité de mandataire immobilier en auto-entreprise !

293804385.Name: Learn the 3 step formula for successful money management
293804385.Tags: Online Marketing,Small Business Marketing Strategy,Professional Networking,Entrepreneur Networking,Motivation & Success
293804385.Long Description:
I realise this invitation is quite close to the event - that may have its advantages for you in terms of follow through. But the main reason is because Charles will be joined by the very effective Jay Hastings. Jay is getting the great results, so he is the one to take advice from.
One of Jay's great contributions to the Digital education scene is his correct view that we have to become a more evolved version of ourselves if we are to expect different results.
May I suggest that we could also practice this at its most basic level by making sure we turn up for this webinar, which you are joining. It's a simply sign of serious intent, if you actually want change. Make the commitment now!!
Learn My 3-Step Formula For Successful Money Management Without Sacrificing Quality Of Your Life
Learn simple money tips to get control of your finances, change your money mindset, build wealh and become financially free.
We are living through are challenging times - inflation, higher interest rates and economic downturn. Despite this, there are always opportunities and there are always people who do well in any economy.
What can you do to not only survive, but thrive regardless of external events?
What’s going on in your own internal economy, and in your head, will have more influence on your financial success than external events.
Recent events have shown us that when things go wrong, like a job loss or higher bills, most people have no back-up plan or savings to get them through a short term crisis.
Learning to manage your money is the first step towards building wealth and becoming financially free.
In this free live online training, I’m going to show you how to get control of your finances in 28 days without sacrificing your enjoyment of life.
About Charles Kelly
Speaker, Podcaster, Author, Property Investor, Digital Marketing and Business Consultant.
Appeared as an expert guest on various TV and Radio shows including, BBC New, Radio 5 and more
Helping people achieve financial freedom through training and education, money management and acquiring money making skills.

Simon Coulson is the founder of The Internet Business School - the foremost UK academy for everything in the Digital business world. He has now made over £30m in this space. Everything he speaks about in this webinar he has either used or coached others to use, to massive advantage.
If you have made a proper decision about creating a new Digital income stream, this is a godsend piece of timing for you. I mean a "burning your boats" type of decision. You have to only go forward, you must find the way. You are not stopping until you succeed.
Listening to Simon in this webinar is a gift of huge proportions for you. So many people have taken Simon's advice and then built life changing businesses. You will be increasing your chances of success by a significant proportion if you listen here and then take real action
So if you are interested, reserve a place now. But remember this, it is normal for at least 50% of people who reserve a seat, not to even turn up!! What does that say about the level of your commitment? Please, if you are going to reserve now, turn up on the 31st, even if you don't feel like it by then. It's what separates out the winners!!

293587074.Long Description:
Die Fertigkeit Verkaufen zu können, ist entscheidend, um geschäftlich erfolgreich zu sein. Was, wenn Verkaufen, weil von Herzen, ganz leicht werden kann?
Sei neugierig! Sei willkommen:
In diesem Mini-Workshop erfährst Du, wie Du das Verkaufen "vergisst" und Dich vielmehr im Verkaufsprozesses darauf konzentrierst
Gespräche und Telefonate zu genießen
Dich mit Menschen von Herzen zu verbinden
zutiefst interessiert zu sein auf Menschen
Wir wollen Dich ermutigen, auf eine Art und Weise zu verkaufen, die Deinem Wesen, Deinem Naturell entspricht.
Wir gehen einführend auf die Phasen des Kaufens ein. Wenn Du sie kennst, ist es deutlich leichter Kunden adäquat zu beraten und zu verkaufen.

Katja & Meike

Dir bewusst sein über Deine Stärken im Verkauf

293142661.Name: Stories, Knowledge, Fears and Failures -- Insights Into Leadership
293142661.Long Description:
Thirty podcast episodes, more than thirty leaders… and hundreds of tips, ideas and stories.
You’ll hear all about it at the next Mind The Gap event!
Darya Kamkalova launched Venturing Women less than 1,5 years ago to inspire women to build businesses, and it quickly became much more than a podcast. With a team of volunteers, Darya also supports fundraising campaigns of female founders, features women entrepreneurs in the data space, hosts events, and more.
She will share knowledge collected from her guests as well as her own journey of building Venturing Women. We’ll examine what opportunities you can unlock as a content creator and a creative mind.
Beyond being a podcast host, Darya is a data industry professional, startup mentor, speaker and co-owner of a craft beer bar Manifest Taproom in Berlin.
Join us for snacks, drinks and insightful conversations!

293167362.Name: Platform Innovation #002: Aufbau und Skalierung von IoT Plattformen
293167362.Long Description:
Agenda:
12:00 - Get Together
12:15 - Vortrag zu Erfolgsfaktoren beim Aufbau von IoT Plattformen - Matthias Walter (fastbreak.one)
12:45 - Austausch
13:00 - Ende
Was ist die Platform Innovation Community?
Die Plattform Innovation Community ist Deutschlands größte Community zur Plattformökonomie. Wir bringen die Community nach Dresden und widmen uns schwerpunktmäßig um IoT und B2B Plattformen.
Ihr Gastgeber ist die fastbreak.one GmbH - ein Venture Studio mit Spezialisierung auf Plattformen und Marktplätze
Wer sollte teilnehmen?
Sie wollen eine Plattform aufbauen wollen sich aber noch mit erfahrenen Gründern austauschen?
Sie wollen Ihre Plattform skalieren, benötigen dafür noch Hinweise?
Oder sie wollen sich einfach so mal mit dem Thema beschäftigen?
Dann seien Sie herzlich eingeladen zu unserer Plattform Innovation Community. Aller zwei Monate treffen wir uns physisch für einen direkten Austausch. In lockerer Atmosphäre gibt es Vorträge und Austausch.
Organisatorisches
Desweiteren erhalten alle Teilnehmer den Zugang zu unserer Online Community für den weiteren Austausch digital.
Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Teilnahme

293546556.Name: StartupBlink's Global Startup Ecosystem Index 2023 Launch Event
293546556.Long Description:
Join us for the highly anticipated launch event of StartupBlink's Global Startup Ecosystem Index 2023 (GSEI2023) on May 30th, 2023. This online event will take place in two sessions, providing attendees from around the world the opportunity to participate at their convenience. 293635804.Name: How to Cut Product Development Costs by up to 50%!
293635804.Long Description:
This event is organized by TechSpeak.
Our meetup group is collaborating by promoting this event.
This event is FREE to attend!
In order to attend, please register here:
http://www.techspeakforentrepreneurs.com/how-to-cut-product-development-costs-by-up-to-50/?utm=ideatoipo
(Registrants will receive the login info right before the start of the event.)
There is a difference between releasing code and releasing code effectively and efficiently. That difference is having an efficient process
a repeatable way to produce consistent results over and over again.
In this webinar, Nelly Yusupova, a CTO with 18 years of experience, a startup tech advisor, and the founder of TechSpeak for Entrepreneurs, will share the process she uses to manage teams and projects to deliver projects on time and on budget.
You will learn:
The lean way vs. traditional way of building products
Two money saving things you should do before you build anything
How to define your MVP properly to reduce the cost and time of development
How to see the red flags sooner and minimize mistakes
and more!
Please come with your questions and scenarios.
About the Speaker
Nelly Yusupova is a CTO, with over 18 years experience, leading companies to technical excellence. She is a startup tech advisor, outsourced CTO, and the creator of TechSpeak for Entrepreneurs.
Nelly is on a mission to help entrepreneurs minimize technology mistakes. Through her online master class TechSpeak for Entrepreneurs, she provides the roadmap to successfully manage technology teams and projects.
Just recently included in Fast Company’s, “League of Extraordinary Women”, Nelly has been at the forefront of the women’ s movement online since 1999 and is one of the Wall Street Journal’s “Women on the IT Fast Track”.
Nelly is a speaker and presenter for many organizations and major industries events including: Women’s Enterprise Center, New York Entrepreneurs Business Network, Small Business Summit, BlogHer, Social Media Jungle, Mom 2.0, BlogWorld, and more.
She has been featured in Inc. Magazine, NBC's Today Show, Fast Company, NewsDay.com, O’Reilly, Smart Money, Small Biz, TechRepublic, Women’s Radio and more.
Nelly can be reached at:
nelly@techspeak.co

293621230.Name: FREE WEBINAR: How to Outsource Development of Your App
293621230.Long Description:
This event is organized by TechSpeak.
Our meetup group is collaborating by promoting this event.
This event is FREE to attend!
In order to attend, please register here:
https://www.techspeakforentrepreneurs.com/outsource/?utm=ideatoipo
(Registrants will receive login info right before the start of the event.)
If you are a non-technical person with an idea for an app, you’re probably looking for a technical co-founder to help you build the app.
However, you can launch a tech startup by outsourcing code!
In the early days of your startup it can be challenging to attract a technical co-founder to build your app. But by knowing how to efficiently outsource the building of your MVP and gain some traction, you can de-risk the opportunity for the tech person and change the conversation from "I Need You" to "Here's an Opportunity".
In this webinar, the speaker will discuss the best way to outsource the development of your app, including:
Why outsourcing may be the best way to find a technical co-founder
Outsourcing best practices
How not get ripped off in the process
and more!

293654839.Name: Scrum Sprechstunde Online
293654839.Long Description:
Hallo zusammen,
im Dezember 2020 gab es die letzte sogenannte "Agile Sprechstunde" - ein Projekt anlässlich zu meinem zehnjährigen Jubiläum als Scrum Master.
Im Laufe der Zeit ist das Interesse an Fragen rund um Scrum nicht abgerissen, weshalb ich mich in dieser Sprechstunde explizit diesem umfangreichen Thema widmen möchte.
Du willst Scrum Master*in werden und brauchst mehr Informationen über den Weg dorthin? Du willst dich als Scrum Master*in selbstständig machen? Oder du hast Fragen zu deinem Scrum Team, bzw. willst die Rolle der Product Owner*in besser verstehen? Ich gehe auf jede gestellte Frage ein!
Natürlich können wir auch auf Methoden gucken, überlegen, wie du deine Retrospektive vorbereiten kannst oder welche Fallstricke in einem Vorstellungsgespräch auftauchen können. Und für die Profis unter euch können wir selbstverständlich auch über Agile Transformationen sprechen und welche Herausforderungen dir hierbei begegnen, bzw. wie wir sie lösen könnten.
Dieses Format findet ab sofort alle zwei Wochen statt und ist auf maximal 9 Teilnehmende begrenzt, damit wir voneinander als Gruppe profitieren können und keine Frage zu kurz kommt.
Ich biete euch einen Raum an, in dem ihr eure Themen und Anliegen mit mir und den anwesenden Teilnehmenden besprechen könnt. Dadurch, dass alle zuhören und mitdiskutieren können, ermöglichen wir jeder Teilnehmer*in ein voneinander Lernen.
Dies ist ein LGBTQ freundliches Format, welches sich außerdem der Förderung von weiblich gelesenen Menschen im Scrum Master*innen Job versteht.
Spielregeln und Ablauf:
Ihr könnt mit der Zoom-App https://zoom.us/support/download oder via Browser teilnehmen.
Ihr könnt jeder Zeit ab 16:00 Uhr dazukommen oder euch wieder ausklinken.
Es ist ein sehr informelles und lockeres Format für Einsteiger und auch Profis.
Wer teilnimmt und eine Frage stellen möchte, kann diese auch optional vorab via Linkedin senden: https://www.linkedin.com/in/stephan-frederik-becker-255bb248
Bringt einfach euer Thema oder eure Frage aus dem Bereich Scrum mit.
Das Schöne an diesem Format: Wer möchte, kann auch einfach zuhören und trotzdem etwas aus den Problemstellungen der anderen lernen.
Wir haben eine Timebox von 45 Minuten, damit dieses Meeting für alle planbar ist.
Wer mehr zu mir und meinen Ansätzen wissen will oder noch mehr Fragen sowie Antworten sucht, kann mein e-Book lesen: https://bookboon.com/de/new-work-ebook
oder unseren Blog:
https://newwork.academy/newworkcommunity-newworkblog/
Ich freue mich auf euch! :-)

293702699.Name: Angel 101 -= What, How and Why of Startup Investing
293702699.Long Description:
Are you intrigued by angel investing but unsure where to start? This Masterclass is tailored just for you, providing a comprehensive introduction to the exciting realm of angel investing.
We will cover three key areas:
1️⃣ Introduction to Angel Investing:
- Define what angel investing is and its vital role in supporting early-stage startups.
- Explore the benefits and risks associated with angel investing.
- Discover the motivations and goals driving angel investors.
2️⃣ Angel Investing Process:
- Walk through the essential steps involved in angel investing, from sourcing opportunities to due diligence and negotiation.
- Learn how angel investors evaluate startups, including assessing the team, market potential, and financials.
- Understand the significance of conducting thorough due diligence and establishing clear investment criteria.
3️⃣ Portfolio Strategy and Risk Management:
- Unlock the concept of portfolio diversification and its crucial role in angel investing.
- Explore various strategies for building a balanced and diversified angel investment portfolio.
- Discover effective risk management techniques, including setting investment limits, ongoing monitoring, and potential exit strategies.
T﻿he event is suitable both for current angel investors and for professionals who are considering angel investing.

293463329.Name: Co-Founder Networking: Find a Business Partner, Online
293463329.Long Description:
One of the most difficult yet important steps in founding a startup is building a great Co-founder team. While many founders may start alone, there are multiple benefits of having a Co-founder, and taking the time to establish a quality team can mean the difference between failure and success. Join us for this fun and interactive online event in Silicon Valley where you will learn best practices for finding and formalizing a Co-founder. In addition, you will have the opportunity to network with others looking for a Co-founder through fun group networking, and one-to-one sessions.
It is not required, but to get the most out of this co-founder networking event, we recommend that you come ready for live video networking and prepare by visiting our Guide to Find a Co-Founder . You can also use this Co-Founder Networking Worksheet prior to joining the event.
To access all of the networking features of this webinar, please join using Chrome or Firefox from a desktop or tablet, or download the Airmeet Mobile App.
❯ Who Should Attend
Anyone who is launching or thinking about launching a Silicon Valley startup
Anyone looking for a co-founder and/or looking to learn about building a co-founder relationship
Anyone interested in finding opportunities with startups
❯ What is the Agenda
Introduction
Short presentation on best practices for finding and formalizing a Co-founder
Group and one-to-one speed networking with others looking for a Co-founder
❯ What Will You Accomplish
Meet startup enthusiasts and experts from around the world
Shortlist individuals that can be a Co-founder
❯❯ This is a live, interactive online event, so be sure to RSVP at https://fi.co/startupwebinar/16190 to receive the Zoom URL to join us live!
