291863033.Name: Connecting the DDDots... Vom Big Picture EventStorming zu Architektur und Code
291863033.Tags: Web Development,Software Architecture,Software Development,Software Craftsmanship,Agile Coaching
291863033.Long Description:
Domain Driven Design (DDD) umfasst eine Vielzahl spezieller Konzepte, wie zum Beispiel Aggregates, Bounded Contexts, EventStorming, Ubiquitous Language und Value Objects. Über Eric Evans grundlegendes Werk – “the Blue Book” – hinaus, gibt es viele hochwertige Informationsquellen. Allzu oft sind sie jedoch sehr spezifisch, sprich, mit hohem Zoom-Faktor.
In diesem Vortrag werden wir verschiedene DDD-Konzepte “im Vorbeigehen”
behandeln und sie zu einem Großen Ganzen zusammenfügen. Wir beginnen mit dem Big Picture EventStorming, das als "Quasi-Standard” für eine erfolgreiche Discovery gilt. Davon ausgehend werden wir uns an folgenden Leitfragen orientieren.
Was sind die nächsten Schritte “am Tag danach”, nach dem Big Picture Workshop?
Warum sind gut geschnittene Bounded Contexts so wichtig und wie kann man gute Kandidaten bestimmen?
Wie funktioniert Context Mapping aus dem “Strategic DDD” und welche Rückschlüsse liefert es?
Sind “taktische DDD-Patterns” mit einer hexagonalen Architektur vereinbar?
Wie kann man rasch Code entwickeln, um frühzeitiges Feedback von Benutzern zu erhalten?
Abschließend folgt ein persönliches Fazit zu DDD und der Motivation dahinter. Als Steilvorlage für kontroverse Diskussionen und zahlreiche Fragen direkt im Anschluss.
...
Den Link zum Online Meeting posten wir hier am Tag des Meetups
Ablauf:
1930h Offizieller Beginn (Aktuelles & interaktiver Vortrag)
2100h Offizielles Ende
After-Session-Beer für Interessierte
...
Über den Sprecher:
Max Jung bringt umfassende Expertise aus vielen Jahren Software-Entwicklung in verschiedensten Branchen, Projekten und Rollen ein. Schon bevor er Domain Driven Design kennenlernte, verfolgte er einen Modell-zentrierten Ansatz mit Fokus auf der Fachlichkeit. In den letzten Jahren konnte er seine Erfahrungen als EventStorming Facilitator weiter ausbauen und leitete Workshops für 7 bis über 40 Teilnehmer. Ab dem 1. Juli 2023 ist Max als selbstständiger Software-Berater tätig.
Seine Leistungen reichen von der Mitarbeit in Projekten als pragmatischer Solutions Architect und Fullstack-Entwickler, über individuelle Trainings und Coaching in Bereichen wie sinnvoll angewandtem DDD, Architektur und Agilität bis hin zur professionellen Facilitation von EventStorming Workshops und ähnlichen Formaten.

293495740.Name: [ On Demand ] Boost Your Skills #5 : L'Infrastructure-as-Code
293495740.Long Description:
La Bent Family vous réserve, ce mercredi 3 Février à 13h00 un workshop sur un sujet à la pointe des avancées de la Data : l’Infrastructure-as-Code.
Nous sommes heureux de recevoir un vrai spécialiste du Cloud, Kévin Didelot, CEO de KELTIO, pour partager avec nous toute son expertise.
Qu’est-ce que l’Infrastructure-as-Code ? Quelles en sont les applications ? Et quel en est le lien avec l'approche MLOps ?
Initialement utilisé exclusivement par les DevOps, l’Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC), également appelée « infrastructure programmable », est un moyen d’automatiser la gestion et l’approvisionnement de l’infrastructure informatique.
L’IaC s’introduit de plus en plus dans les méthodes du MLOps, notamment en ce qui concerne l’automatisation d’entrainement de modèles.
Que vous soyez spécialiste ou simplement curieux, nous vous attendons nombreux et d’ici-là prenez soin de vous.
Blent Family ! 💙

293229210.Name: Coding Dojo du Midi - Initiation au TDD
293229210.Long Description:
Bowling Game en TCR
Le but du kata est de calculer le score d'une partie de Bowling terminée et correcte.
Pour cette session, nous ferons du TCR (Test && Commit || Revert) de Coding Dojo. Cette contrainte implique que, sur un cycle de 2mn, il faut être dans un état vert (qui compile avec des tests qui passent) sans quoi on revert les changements fait sur l'itération. Dès qu'on est dans un état vert on peut commit et repartir pour 2 nouvelles minutes
La session se déroulera sur notre discord.

293489509.Name: Refactoring in TypeScript - Yatzi Coding Kata Contest
293489509.Tags: Agile Project Management,Software Architecture,Test Driven Development,Clean Code,Software Engineering
293489509.Long Description:
Let's refactor together some TypeScript code and practice with FP, OOP, and array operators!
I feel we spent too much time in Java. To balance this, let's take some (intentional) messy TypeScript code and clean it.
Among the learning points:
Mastering Array operators
FP principles: avoid mutation, pure functions
OOP: identify new value objects to enrich code semantics
Baby-steps refactoring taking small safe steps
TypeScript-specific tricks and clean code rules
Prep-work:
Just watching is fine, but if you want to become better at refactoring and crafting software, I will invite you to clone the original code and spend 2-4 hours refactoring it before attending this event (instructions are in the project readme):
https://github.com/victorrentea/kata-yatzy-ts
⭐️ Post your solution
If you refactored the exercise and are happy with the results, please post a comment to this event with the git link to the refactored version, plus the time it took to refactor it.
The speaker
Victor Rentea is a Java Champion with 17 years of experience, passionate about crafting clean code, architecture, testing, and performance. He is a regular conference speaker and founder of the European Software Crafters Community. Victor works as a freelance consultant and trainer, running workshops for top companies throughout Europe. Find out how he can help you on victorrentea.ro
As usual, the event will be live-streamed on YouTube where it will remain recorded: https://youtube.com/live/YUjYlueiF18?feature=share

Coding Bootcamp Praha is a multi-awarded coding bootcamp (Top #3 by the MIT and #1 by the EC).
We organise coding bootcamps in web development and data science three times a year in Prague, Czech Republic or you can also study remotely.
More than 90% of our students find a job in the industry within 2 months of their graduation.
As an NGO we believe that education should be affordable, thus we offer tuition plans that fits every budget - including a deferred tuition plan.
***************************************
Coding Bootcamp Praha has helped hundreds of career changers to get into tech. The emphasis is on understanding the best practices, learning by doing, and solving real-world problems. Throughout the bootcamp, students learn to cooperate in teams and create a portfolio of projects. The alumni keep in touch after graduation at alumni events, activities and on social media.
Further details about our courses and how to apply can be found at codingbootcamp.cz.
For details about other upcoming events, check out codingbootcamp.cz/events.
Connect with us
Check video interviews with our students on Youtube
Follow us on LinkedIn
Like us on Facebook
Follow us on Twitter
Check out our Instagram

293525823.Name: Python And Ruby Co-Learning
293525823.Long Description:
COVID-19 update: We are holding all our Co-Learning virtually. If you want to attend, please sign up to our Slack: https://join.slack.com/t/opentechschool/shared_invite/zt-bbyjo92d-xtpp3Wz0kt_NoTQcMQT4rw
Find this meetup in the #bln-serverside-colearning channel.
http://photos1.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/2/7/2/6/600_286750022.jpeg
This is a work group of Python and Ruby learners, meeting up every other week to continue learning on python. As always there will be experienced Coaches around but we also just learn from each other. You can just check the RSVP-List for people tagged "coach" and feel free to contact any of them directly at the event.
This group is open to total beginners in programming, who want to learn Python or Ruby, as well as to people, who are further or just have specific questions and/or need help with related topics. Please don't forget to bring your own laptop.
The OpenTechSchool Python Coaches (https://groups.google.com/a/opentechschool.org/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/coaches.python) release all their learning material at learn.opentechschool.org (http://learn.opentechschool.org/). Feel free to take a look.

293572901.Name: Server-Side Co-Learning (on-line)
293572901.Long Description:
COVID-19 update: We are holding all our Co-Learning virtually. If you want to attend, please sign up to our Slack: https://join.slack.com/t/opentechschool/shared_invite/zt-bbyjo92d-xtpp3Wz0kt_NoTQcMQT4rw
Find this meetup in the #server-side channel.
We learn server side programming together! Want to setup a blog using Wordpress? Program your first Django or Rails app? Install an audio server on a Raspberry Pi? Improve your testing skills?
Whether your language of choice is Ruby, Python, PHP or something entirely different, come along. There will be coaches present who can help you with Ruby, Python, PHP and Go. If we don’t know something, let’s figure it out together!
This group is open to total beginners in programming as well as to more experienced programmers who want to get their feet wet in another language or explore new topics.
If possible, bring your own laptop. We have some computers available, but they are a bit slow. Snacks are also very welcome!
Our learning materials are available under https://learn.opentechschool.org.
We run a short intro round at the beginning of the meetup where everyone can say what their project is or how they can help others.
We speak German and English.
IMPORTANT NOTES & LINKS:
• The RSVP-function will be open 7 days before a meetup takes place.
• If you don't have a project to work on, it is often a good idea to do a tutorial or some exercises. See our discourse thread (http://discourse.opentechschool.org/t/ruby-co-learning-resources) that includes our favorites (and add your own).

289391245.Name: [Q&A session] Data Science Bootcamp
289391245.Tags: Bootcamps,Online Education,Data Science,Education & Technology,Coding for Beginners
289391245.Long Description:
The old way was to teach computers how to do.
The new way is to teach computers how to learn.
The Data world is broad. Beyond Data Scientist and Data Analyst, there are many positions that require the skills you are taught in our Data Science bootcamp.
But what exactly can you expect? Which skills do you need? What jobs can you expect to get after our Bootcamp?
Join our next Q&A session with our Product Lead Joan who will answer all your questions about our Data Science Bootcamp.
Register now!
𝗔𝗯𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗪𝗕𝗦 𝗖𝗢𝗗𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗦𝗖𝗛𝗢𝗢𝗟
We offer a hybrid coding bootcamp to turn you into a fully operational Full-Stack Web & App Developer, Data Scientist, Digital Product Designer or Marketing Analyst in just 15 weeks (full-time) . We want your career to take off, so you will learn the most cutting-edge coding skills.
For the first 13 weeks, you will study remotely on our virtual learning platform together with your classmates. This high convenience makes it easy for you to decide from where to join. Benefit from live and interactive coding classes with instructor-led lectures, workshops, team coding challenges, and much more.
The big finale is your 2 weeks stay at our Berlin Campus – accommodation and food included. Live and code together with your classmates while you work on your final portfolio project! You will also receive career coaching and we will make sure that you will have a great time together.
Not coming to Campus? We'll make sure you're still connected to your course to enjoy the learning experience via live broadcast.
Regarding COVID-19 we will constantly update the information about the stay in Berlin! The health of our students and teachers has utmost priority.

293403631.Name: Hack Evening (Online) - with optional Kata
293403631.Tags: Computer Programming,JavaScript Frameworks,Social Coding,Software Development,Learn to Code
293403631.Long Description:
Hack Evenings provide a safe and welcoming co-learning environment to work on your side project, online course, tutorials or code challenges and improve your programming skills!
It is not programming language or technology specific - if you are eager to spend time improving your coding skills or you have fun mentoring others, you are welcome to join! When you get stuck with something more experienced members can jump in and help.
The agenda for the evening:
19:00 - Welcome and introduction round so everybody knows your name and what your focus during the event will be.
19:20 - Networking: Break out rooms of two people.
19:30 - Coding time: Individually or in groups, members are working on projects / courses / coding exercises.
19:30 - Optional: Selected Kata is announced, find a partner if you like to pair, then work on the Kata alone or with your partner.
20:45 - Wrap-up and share our learnings and experience during the event.
21:00 - Thank you!
Having a camera and microphone during the event is recommended.
Let's do a Kata together
We want to try and incorporate a Kata into the Hack Evening as an option for those who are looking for something to do!
A Kata is a small programming exercise, meant to improve your skills in solving coding problems. Training with these exercises can help during interviews and build of your confidence overall.
You will have the option to work alone or to pair up - a chance to practice pair coding at the same time!
Stay tuned - the selected Kata will be announced in the event!
Not sure what to focus on for the evening? A list of learning resources for different programming languages and ideas for small projects can be found here:
https://github.com/WomenWhoCode/Berlin/tree/master/hack-evenings
Stay in touch with the community! Join our slack:
http://bit.ly/WWCHackEveningsSlack
In order to make our events inclusive and a safe place for people to come learn, we do not tolerate harassment of members or event participants in any form.
Please refer to the WWC Code of Conduct which can be found here: https://www.womenwhocode.com/codeofconduct

293609819.Name: Microsoft Build 2023: Analyse & Diskussion
293609819.Long Description:
Es ist wieder soweit, die Microsoft Build 2023 steht vor der Tür! Nach dem großen Event am 23. bis 25. Mai, laden wir euch ein, am 9. Juni mit Gregor Biswanger und Jürgen Gutsch die wichtigsten Punkte zu durchleuchten.
Wir werfen einen Blick auf die neuesten Trends und Innovationen, die die Softwareentwicklung beeinflussen werden. Mit Fokus auf künstlicher Intelligenz, Updates zu Microsoft 365, Bing und die neuesten Funktionen in Microsoft Teams, gibt es viel zu diskutieren.
Also, seid dabei am 9. Juni, wenn wir gemeinsam die Auswirkungen der Konferenz auf die Softwareentwicklung analysieren und diskutieren.
Wir freuen uns auf eure Fragen, Meinungen und die spannende Diskussion!
P.S. Am Ende der Show gibt es ein Quiz-Spiel und der erste Platz bekommt eine NCrunch Lizenz.
Ncrunch ist ein automatisiertes paralleles Continuous-Testing-Tool für Visual Studio. Es ermöglicht Entwicklern, ihre Codeänderungen in Echtzeit zu testen, indem es Tests parallel und automatisch im Hintergrund ausführt.
Jürgen Gutsch ist Software Engineer bei der YOO AG in Basel. Neben Familie und Beruf ist Jürgen als freier Autor, Trainer und Berater unterwegs, er betreibt ein Blog auf http://asp.net-hacker.rocks und wurde mehrfach mit dem MVP-Award für „Development Tools“ ausgezeichnet.
Gregor Biswanger ist ein renommierter Berater, Trainer, Autor und Sprecher, der für sein Fachwissen in Softwarearchitektur, Cloud, Web und Cross-Platform-Entwicklung mit C# und JavaScript/TypeScript bekannt ist. Als Microsoft MVP, Intel Black Belt und Intel Software Innovator bietet er Beratungsdienstleistungen für große und mittelständische Unternehmen, Organisationen und Agenturen an. Seine Schwerpunkte sind der MEAN-Stack, ASP.NET Core, Docker, Azure, Domain-Driven Design und Microservices.
Als freier Autor schreibt Gregor für heise.de und andere Fachzeitschriften. Er ist ein gefragter Sprecher auf internationalen Konferenzen und aktiv in verschiedenen Communities engagiert. Aufgrund seiner umfassenden Erfahrung und seines Engagements im Bereich gilt Gregor Biswanger als einer der bekanntesten .NET- und JavaScript-Experten in Deutschland, Schweiz und Österreich. Sie können Gregor unter http://about.me/gregor.biswanger erreichen.

293575550.Name: Automated Testing Workshop
293575550.Tags: Career Coaching,Test Driven Development,Courses and Workshops,nodeJS,Software QA and Testing
293575550.Long Description:
Join us for an interactive workshop where Radu introduces us to automated testing in Javascript. We will cover the whole testing pyramid, from unit tests to end-to-end tests.
EVENT DESCRIPTION
"Automated Testing" workshop by Radu Nicoara
************************************************
Join us for an interactive workshop deep-diving into the world of automated testing! This event is perfect for anyone with some coding experience that is curious about how to get started with writing tests.
We will write unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests together, all using only JavaScript.
We will learn how to do test-driven-development (TDD), and how to make sure that the code that we write actually does what it is supposed to, and that it won't get modified in unexpected ways down the road.
As a pre-requisite, you should have some prior knowledge of JavaScript and bring a laptop with you.
SCHEDULE
6:00 pm - Arrival and Introductions
6:30 pm - Workshop "Automated Testing" by Radu Nicoara
7:30 pm - Wrap up & Networking
EVENT ACCESS
This is an in-person event at the Bayer Office. Soft drinks will be provided.
In order to provide building and wifi access for attendees, please provide your name and email address during sign-up. We need it to create guests accounts for everyone.
CODE OF CONDUCT
Women Who Code (WWCode) is dedicated to providing an empowering experience for everyone who participates in or supports our community, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, ability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, socioeconomic status, caste, or creed. Our events are intended to inspire women to excel in technology careers, and anyone who is there for this purpose is welcome. Because we value the safety and security of our members and strive to have an inclusive community, we do not tolerate harassment of members or event participants in any form.
Our Code of Conduct (https://www.womenwhocode.com/codeofconduct) applies to all events run by Women Who Code, Inc. If you would like to report an incident or contact our leadership team, please submit an incident report form (http://bit.ly/wwcode-incident-form).

293585738.Name: FreeCodeCamp Berlin
293585738.Long Description:
* English below *
Offenes Co-Working/Co-Learning; arbeite am FreeCodeCamp-Curriculum oder deinem eigenen Projekt. Gegenseitiger Austausch und Unterstützung sind willkommen. Es wird Englisch und Deutsch gesprochen.
Es gibt schnelles Internet, Strom, Snacks, Getränke und eine nette Atmosphäre. :-)
Um 11Uhr und 16 Uhr machen wir eine Runde Code-Präsentationen. Jeder kann mitmachen. Zeige Deinen Code auf der großen Leinwand und stelle Dein Projekt vor. Erhalte Feedback oder Hilfe bei einem Problem und lasse andere von Dir lernen!
Du musst keine große Präsentation vorbereiten, schließe einfach Deinen Laptop an und zeige uns, woran Du gerade arbeitest. Ebenfalls auf Englisch oder Deutsch, wie Du Dich wohler fühlst.
* English *
Open co-working/co-learning; work on the FreeCodeCamp curriculum or your own project. Mutual exchange and support are welcome. English and German are spoken.
There is fast internet, electricity, snacks, drinks and a nice atmosphere. :-)
At 11am and 4pm we will do a round of code presentations. Everybody can participate. Show your code on the big screen and present your project. Get feedback or help with a problem and let others learn from you!
You don't have to prepare a big presentation, just plug in your laptop and show us what you're working on. Also in English or German, as you feel more comfortable.

293710599.Name: Einführung in Event Storming: Erste Schritte zu effektivem DDD
293710599.Tags: Software Architecture,Domain Driven Design,Software Development,Microservices,Women Programmers
293710599.Long Description:
Mach dich bereit für eine aufregende Reise durch die Welt des Event Storming. Wir laden dich herzlich zu unserem nächsten Twitch-Livestream ein, der dir die Türen zu einem effektiven und erkenntnisreichen Prozess öffnet - der Bestimmung von Kontextgrenzen im Domain-Driven Design (DDD) durch Event Storming.
Gemeinsam entdecken wir, wie Event Storming dir bei der Aufteilung von Microservices helfen kann. Und wenn du dich jemals gefragt hast, wie du dieses mächtige Werkzeug am besten nutzen kannst, dann darfst du diesen Stream nicht verpassen.
An diesem Abend wirst du von einer einzigartigen Gruppe von Experten begleitet. Ina Einemann, eine renommierte Stimme im Bereich DDD, wird ihre reichen Erfahrungen und Einsichten mit dir teilen. Max Jung, ebenfalls erfahrener DDD-Enthusiast, wird dir von den Gelegenheiten und Herausforderungen berichten, die ihm bei der Implementierung von Event Storming begegnet sind. Und natürlich ist auch Gregor Biswanger dabei, um seine Expertise und lebendigen Geschichten aus der Praxis mit dir zu teilen.
Wir haben eine spannende Einführung in Event Storming vorbereitet, gepaart mit dem Austausch von Erfahrungen aus der realen Welt. Egal, ob du neu in diesem Bereich bist oder einfach deine Kenntnisse erweitern möchtest - dieser Stream hat für dich etwas zu bieten.
Wir freuen uns auf dich! Schließ dich uns an und erlebe, wie Event Storming deine Sichtweise auf DDD verändern kann. Sei dabei, lerne von den Besten und beginne dein nächstes Projekt mit einem frischen und erweiterten Blick.
Bis dann, wir sehen uns im Stream!
Unsere Gäste:
Ina Einemann ist als Agile Coach bei der open knowledge GmbH in Oldenburg tätig. Sie arbeitet als agiler Coach mit dem Schwerpunkt Anforderungsmanagement und Product Ownership. Seit zehn Jahren beschäftigt sie sich mit agilen Methoden und Vorgehensmodellen und berät Teams bei der Umsetzung agiler Praktiken mit dem Ziel Teams zu motivieren tolle Produkte umzusetzen. Sie spricht regelmäßig auf agilen Veranstaltungen, ist Kuratorin diverser Konferenzen und einer der Hosts des agilen Podcasts „Mein Scrum ist kaputt”. 2022 veröffentlicht sie mit Frank Düsterbeck das Buch „Product Ownership meistern. Produkte erfolgreich entwickeln".
Max Jung bringt als selbstständiger Berater ("Software Problem Solver") umfassende Expertise aus vielen Jahren Entwicklung in verschiedensten Branchen, Projekten und Rollen ein. Schon bevor er Domain Driven Design für sich entdeckte, bevorzugte er bereits einen Modell-zentrierten Ansatz mit Fokus auf der Fachlichkeit. Seine Leistungen reichen von der Mitarbeit in Projekten als pragmatischer Solutions Architect und Fullstack-Entwickler, über individuelle Trainings und Coaching in Bereichen wie sinnvoll angewandtem DDD, Architektur und Agilität, bis hin zur professionellen Facilitation von EventStorming Workshops und ähnlichen Formaten.
Gregor Biswanger ist ein renommierter Berater, Trainer, Autor und Sprecher, der für sein Fachwissen in Softwarearchitektur, Cloud, Web und Cross-Platform-Entwicklung mit C# und JavaScript/TypeScript bekannt ist. Als Microsoft MVP, Intel Black Belt und Intel Software Innovator bietet er Beratungsdienstleistungen für große und mittelständische Unternehmen, Organisationen und Agenturen an. Seine Schwerpunkte sind der MEAN-Stack, ASP.NET Core, Docker, Azure, Domain-Driven Design und Microservices.
Als freier Autor schreibt Gregor für heise.de und andere Fachzeitschriften. Er ist ein gefragter Sprecher auf internationalen Konferenzen und aktiv in verschiedenen Communities engagiert. Aufgrund seiner umfassenden Erfahrung und seines Engagements im Bereich gilt Gregor Biswanger als einer der bekanntesten .NET- und JavaScript-Experten in Deutschland, Schweiz und Österreich. Sie können Gregor unter http://about.me/gregor.biswanger erreichen.
P.S. Am Ende der Show gibt es ein Quiz-Spiel und der erste Platz bekommt eine "Free Personal Subscription" von JetBrains.
z.B. Für AppCode, CLion, DataGrip, GoLand, IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate, PhpStorm, PyCharm, ReSharper, ReSharper C++, Rider, RubyMine, WebStorm, oder dotUltimate.

293214955.Name: Creative Code Stammtisch [LIVE @ CO-UP]
293214955.Long Description:
The Creative Code Stammtisch is an open conversation between artists, makers, designers, coders, performers, learners and anyone interested in the use of computing skills for artistic expression. The event is free and open to all, regardless of age, origin, gender or experience. Beginners and first-timers should feel especially welcome! You don't have to be a coder yourself 😃
NOTE: Find the covid rules at the bottom.
NOTE 2: Due to construction, the space is currently only accessible via the temporary walkway located at Adalbertstr. 5-6 (next to the Kreuzberg Merkezi building). For a map and more detailled instructions, see https://co-up.de/about/ or watch this video
WHAT SHOULD I EXPECT?
There is a time for people to present something if they want to, followed by informal discussions. Every topic is fair game, from net art to computational design and interactive installations all the way to wearable electronics and generative literature... It's a whole evening packed with fun, inspiration and human connection.
Join us on Friday and see for yourself, ask questions if you want, contribute with your comments and maybe show a project you're working on. We're looking forward to meet you all!
Note that this event is NOT just for coders! If you like art and/or technology, you will certainly enjoy yourself, and perhaps even learn something!
A NOTE ON DIVERSITY
We do our best to create a welcoming environment for all people regardless of race, ethnicity, color, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, or genetics. People from group generally underrepresented in open-source, art, and technology fields are warmly encouraged to come by. And if you don't belong to an underrepresented group yourself, we kindly ask you to pause for a minute and think of a friend who does and would enjoy this meetup, and invite them to join... seriously, just stop reading and do it 🙈
SAFE SPACE POLICY
We support the Berlin Code of Conduct:
berlincodeofconduct.org (http://berlincodeofconduct.org/)
Please read and make sure you agree with its content.
ACCESSIBILITY
Co.up rooms are located on the third floor, so we will happily provide assistance with the elevator to those you if you need it. Please let us know in advance as there is an elevator key in the space. We're very sorry to say that co.up's bathrooms are not wheelchair accessible, but there are some accessible bathrooms nearby, including at the Wilhelm Liebknecht/Namik Kemal Bibliothek, Möbel Olfe, and Südblock.
DO I NEED TO SPEAK GERMAN?
We speak mostly English so international guests are more than welcome! Our team also speaks French, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Finnish and German... though language availability may vary depending on which organizers are present :)
CONTACT
Raphaël de Courville
team@creativecode.berlin
+49 (0) 176 70070572
Or shout random words at us on Twitter: @creativeCodeBLN (https://twitter.com/creativeCodeBLN)

293690968.Name: Brauch ich wirklich eine Berunfähigkeitsversicherung? 🤔
293690968.Long Description:
Mit dem Geld, das wir verdienen, konsumieren wir und bezahlen alles was wir für unser Leben wollen und brauchen. Jeden Monat aufs Neue. Dazu kommen dann noch unsere persönlichen Ziele und Wünsche, für die wir einen Teil des Gehalts zurücklegen und rentabel investieren. Unser monatliches Einkommen finanziert also unseren Lebensstandard.
Doch was ist, wenn das eigene Gehalt auf einmal weniger wird, oder gar wegfällt? Was passiert wenn man gesundheitlich nicht mehr im Stande ist, seinem Job nachzugehen? Wie sichert man sein Einkommen ab? Wie trägt man die laufenden Kosten?
Auf diese vielen Fragen, scheint es eine vermeintlich einfach Antwort zu geben: Die Berufsunfähigkeitsversicherung. Aber stimmt das?
Um diese & noch weitere Fragezeichen aufzulösen, sprechen wir bei unserem Event ganz einfach und verständlich über folgende Punkte:
Was genau ist eine Berufsunfähigkeitsversicherung und in welchen Fällen sichert sie dich ab?
Welche Leistungen erhalte ich vom Staat und Arbeitgeber
Für wen ist eine Absicherung sinnvoll?
Welche Bausteine benötige ich unbedingt bei einer Absicherung, welche nicht?
Was mache ich wenn ich aus gesundheitlichen Gründen keine Absicherung mehr bekommen kann?
Das und vieles mehr werden wir in gewohnter Finanzcafé-Atmosphäre mit viel Witz, Charme & Aha-Momenten durchgehen. Danach seid ihr bestens informiert und könnt eine für euch sinnvolle Entscheidung treffen.
Wir freuen uns auf ein tolles Finanzcafé mit dir!

Passcode: KDB99t

Started fresh your job in Germany 🇩🇪 and you been ignoring the topic of finance as an unknown mystery until now?
Do you know statements like: "Oh, I can take care of that later, when I have my first job and earn some money? - This is understandable at first because finances, contracts, and small print are not the most exciting things in the world. Therefore use this webinar to acquire all the essential knowledge about finances in Germany 🇩🇪 .
Take advantage of this opportunity and help yourself to the greatest benefit of your income.
Topics of our interactive seminar:

❖Finances (How can I position myself securely in the short, medium, and long term?)
Your questions will be answered such as:
✅ How do I actually manage my salary in such a way that I obtain something out of it, in the short, medium, and long term?

293325825.Name: Comprendre l'investissement en crowdfunding immobilier
293325825.Long Description:
Bonjour à tous.
Jeudi 1 juin 2023 aura lieu un nouveau meet-up ! Il sera en visioconférence et accessible à tous. L'objectif est de présenter l'investissement en crowdfunding immobilier.
Le crowdfunding immobilier est une bonne solution de diversification, qui apporte un certain niveau de rendement, mais dont les risques sont à étudier en détail. Facile à mettre en place, le crowdfunding immobilier consiste à participer au financement d'une opération immobilière, rapportant ainsi un rendement distribué en coupons.
Lien pour rejoindre la visioconférence : https://meet.google.com/gbi-jzio-gtz?authuser=2
Au programme :
Principe du financement participatif
Qu'est-ce que le crowdfunding immobilier ?
Le risque et l'intérêt de l'opération
Exemple concret
Il y aura d'autres meets-up similaires à celui-ci, pour ceux ne pouvant pas participer.

293687458.Name: Comment optimiser sa fiscalité
293687458.Tags: Investing for Retirement,Financial Independence,Learning,Real Estate Investors,Investing
293687458.Long Description:
Bonjour à tous.
Mardi 13 juin 2023 aura lieu un nouveau meet-up ! Il sera en visioconférence et accessible à tous. L'objectif est de présenter les différents moyens d'optimiser sa fiscalité en France.
Impôt sur le revenu, impôt sur les sociétés, flat tax, IFI... Dois-je faire de la réduction d'impôt ou de la déduction d'impôt ? D'ailleurs, quelle différence ? Et le crédit d'impôt qu'est-ce donc ?
La fiscalité est parfois (très souvent*) complexe en France, il existe une multitude de méthodes pour optimiser ses impôts et on peut facilement s'y perdre. Une chose à retenir : il n'existe pas de solution magique et chaque investissement comporte un risque. Le but de ce meet-up va être d'éclaircir tout cela et de prendre du recul sur les différentes solutions qui existent.
Lien pour rejoindre la visioconférence : https://meet.google.com/rsa-qfwv-bko?authuser=2
Il y aura d'autres meets-up similaires à celui-ci, pour ceux ne pouvant pas participer.

293325764.Name: L'Assurance Vie : comment ça fonctionne ?
293325764.Long Description:
Bonjour à tous.
Mercredi 31 mai 2023 aura lieu un nouveau meet-up ! Il sera en visioconférence et accessible à tous. L'objectif est de présenter le fonctionnement de l'Assurance Vie.
Quand on pense à l’assurance vie, on imagine une assurance décès ou quelque chose lié uniquement à la transmission et succession de patrimoine, la faute au nom qu’on lui a donné. L’assurance vie permet en effet d’investir sur les marchés financiers, en obtenant une fiscalité avantageuse après quelques années. Elle permet de construire une stratégie d’investissement sur mesure en composant son contrat d’unités de compte (et également de fonds en euro). Nous allons voir concrètement quel intérêt il y a à souscrire à une Assurance Vie (voir à plusieurs), comment cela fonctionne et quels sont les performances potentielles sur différentes durées d'investissement.
Lien pour rejoindre la visioconférence : https://meet.google.com/iwo-uvbr-qqw?authuser=2
Au programme :
Comment investir sur les marchés financiers
Présentation de l'Assurance Vie
Construction d'un contrat d'Assurance Vie
Exemples concrets selon le profil investisseur
Il y aura d'autres meets-up similaires à celui-ci, pour ceux ne pouvant pas participer.

293325871.Name: Comprendre l'investissement en produit structuré
293325871.Tags: Investing for Retirement,Financial Independence,Financial Freedom,Learning,Real Estate Investors
293325871.Long Description:
Bonjour à tous.
Mercredi 7 juin 2023 aura lieu un nouveau meet-up ! Il sera en visioconférence et accessible à tous. L'objectif est de présenter l'investissement en produit structuré.
Le produit structuré est un produit (complexe) qui permet d'investir sur les marchés financiers. Il permet de combiner rendement et protection en capital, selon l'évolution d'un " sous-jacent ".
Bonne alternative à l'investissement traditionnel sur les marchés, son mécanisme est néanmoins complexe et opaque, l'objectif de ce meet-up sera de rendre accessible ce type d'investissement.
Lien visio : https://meet.google.com/jpf-syhh-ykx?authuser=2
Au programme :
Quel est le fonctionnement d'un produit structuré ?
Comment est-il construit ? Qu'est-ce qu'un " sous jacent " ?
Différents types de structuré
Choisir son enveloppe pour investir
Quelle stratégie mettre en place ?
Il y aura d'autres meets-up similaires à celui-ci, pour ceux ne pouvant pas participer.

Mercredi 14 juin 2023 aura lieu un nouveau meet up ! Il sera en visioconférence et accessible à tous. L'objectif est de présenter la gestion de patrimoine dans son ensemble (immobilier, financier, etc...).
Le métier de conseiller en gestion de patrimoine permet de travailler sur toutes les solutions et thématiques du marché, celles-ci sont nombreuses. Préparer sa retraite, dynamiser son épargne, faire de l'optimisation fiscale, développer son patrimoine immobilier, préparer une succession... 292275417.Name: ***Pensions Special*** Paul Lanfear's Property & Investor Breakfast (Zoom)
292275417.Tags: Real Estate Investing,Rental Property Investments,Real Estate Networking,Property Investors Network,Real Estate Investment Education
292275417.Long Description:
Virtual Property & Investor Breakfast (Zoom) - Online only via Zoom
Pensions Special.
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-64789405
# Budget summary: Key points from Jeremy Hunt’s 2023 Budget
Cap on amount workers can accumulate in pensions savings over their lifetime before having to pay extra tax (currently £1.07m) to be abolished
Tax-free yearly allowance for pension pot to rise from £40,000 to £60,000 - having been frozen for nine years
Recent testimonial:
“The Property and Investor breakfast was a great introduction to a lovely and committed group of people who have a powerful skill set to share. Paul chairs a two hour breakfast for Property Investors where their experiences of the property market was shared and problems solved. People were passionate and knowledgeable and I was entertained and informed. When it was my turn to ask a question, the group gave excellent advice and directed me to people and services that could solve my problems. Thanks Paul! Brilliant idea!”
This is a virtual monthly breakfast meeting normally held on one Friday of the month for property and other investors. The meeting is for two hours from 7.30am - 9.30am.
The purpose of the meeting is to share knowledge and get to know other investors better. Everyone gets the same amount of time to share their property problem, questions or anything they want to share with the group.
Topics often covered include deal analysis, finding JV partners, HMOs, R2R/Rent to Rent, best type of investments, latest changes in the law, finances, lettings, how to make use better work of networking, raising investment and more....
There are no formal presentations in this group. The group is chaired by experienced property investor, Paul Lanfear. Paul has been a property investor for over 10 years.

293509386.Name: FREE EVENT - How to be a Successful Investor in the Stock Market
293509386.Long Description:
An Introduction on How to Become a Successful Stock Market Investor.
Now is a great time to develop new skills especially against a background of a cost of living crisis, increasing inflation and interest rates, maybe recession We have record levels of inflation. How are you protecting yourself from all this?
Do you want to learn how to take advantage of lower stock prices?
Do you have cash on deposit earning almost nothing?
Have you lost money from trading in the Stock market?
Are you behind with your pension planning?
Are you worried about what is happening to your pension in this choppy market?
Do you wish that you had more financial education?
Are we heading for another great financial and stock market crash? There has never been a more important time to learn about protecting your wealth and learning how to survive and thrive in a financial crisis.
2023 will bring opportunity for those who know what they are doing.
It is no coincidence that many of the world’s wealthiest people have made their fortunes from the Stock Market including Warren Buffett, Jeff Bezos and Ray Dalio. In this essential presentation, your host Jonathan Horrocks will give you an introduction to investing in the Stock Market including:
Why you should consider investing in the stock market
Why now is a good time to start learning about the stock market
The Psychology of Investing
Risk Management
The Big Secret to beating the market consistently
Keeping it simple
How to create wealth over the long term and avoid getting hurt in a market crash
Jonathan Horrocks is a Chartered Accountant who has been investing in the Stock market for over 45 years and who has been following the markets closely for over 10 years. He has trained with some of the top investors in the world. He loves to teach and you will feel his enthusiasm for the subject when you attend this presentation.
To attend this amazing presentation, just click on the Zoom link on this page at 7pm on Wednesday 21 June 2023. I look forward to seeing you on the call. The presentation will last just over an hour.

293732938.Long Description: Get ready to take some serious notes, because Walter Living and Viisi are joining forces to bring you a webinar packed with all the insider knowledge you need to know if you're buying a house. Our expert Martine will spill the beans on the housing market and share proven strategies for placing the winning bid. Plus, an expert from Viisi will share tips and tricks on the financial side of things, and answer all the questions you might have. Don't miss out on getting closer to your dream home!

293680426.Name: Master the Three-Step Formula for Financial Success
293680426.Tags: Financial Education,Financial Freedom,Wealth Building,Money Management,Success Mindset
293680426.Long Description:
Are you struggling to get control of your finances? Do you want to change your money mindset, build wealth and become financially free?
Join us for a free live online training where you will learn simple money tips that will help you achieve financial success.
In this training hosted by Charles Kelly, speaker, podcaster, author, property investor & digital marketing and business consultant, you will learn the 3-step formula for successful money management. You will discover how to manage your money effectively without sacrificing your enjoyment of life.
You will learn how to change your money mindset, get control of your finances, and build wealth in 28 days. Charles will share practical tips and strategies that will help you become financially free. You will learn how to create a budget, manage your debts, and increase your income.
Recent events have shown us that having a back-up plan or savings is crucial to getting through short-term crises. In this training, you will learn how to manage your money and create a plan for your financial future.
Don't miss this opportunity to learn from a financial expert who has appeared as an expert guest on various TV and Radio shows, including BBC News and Radio 5. Join us and start your journey towards financial freedom today.
Look forward to seeing you there.
Please Note:
This is a FREE online event.
Our guest speaker may provide an optional opportunity for further collaboration, but it is not obligatory. We value transparency and want to give you the choice to explore this option if it aligns with your interests.

293556773.Name: How to Use LinkedIn to Generate a Second Income Easily

How would an additional few hundred or thousand extra pounds each month make a difference to your life?
What if I told you that you could generate this extra income without spending hours each day, building a website, or even having any previous experience? And what if I told you that you could do it all for free, without spending a penny on LinkedIn premium accounts or advertising?
Join me on Monday, May 8th for a live workshop where our guest speaker Mr Paul Chuter, a LinkedIn Business Coach Specialist will show you how to leverage one of the most untapped traffic sources on the internet using LinkedIn. You'll learn how to drive highly targeted visitors to high ticket coaching events and make four-figure sums in the process - all without having to sell anything or build a complex website.
In this workshop, you'll discover:
🚀 How to generate income quickly and easily, even if you have no previous experience or understanding
🚀 How to get tons of free traffic from LinkedIn while others are wasting money on Facebook ads
🚀 How to do all of this without spending hours each day or having to create a fancy website
🚀 How to implement a simple strategy that anyone, even those who aren't tech-savvy, can follow
This workshop is perfect for anyone who wants to generate a steady income without having to invest a lot of time or money. Whether you're time-poor, don't enjoy selling, or just want a simple strategy that works, this session is for you.
Seats for this workshop are limited, so be sure to sign up now and show up 10 minutes early to secure your spot. Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn how to create a second income on LinkedIn without breaking the bank.
We look forward to seeing you there.

293732789.Long Description:

This monthly network is for property investors, property professionals and property enthusiasts in the UK.
This is a safe, private space where we share best practices and help one another.
Do you have an issue you're trying to solve? Run it past another investor in the group, they've more than likely encountered it before.
Or maybe you are new to property and have a question? Again, someone in the group will be able to give you an answer.
Get to know other investors and professionals.
If you have a property-related business, you are welcome to share it with the group.
Past topics include mortgages, how to maximise the value of a property and land, property opportunities, breaking property news, property management, deal analysis, joint venturing, HMOs, lettings and raising finance.
Reviews
"Thanks Marco for your help with the offers, I may have been tempted to go quite a bit higher without you telling me to believe in the numbers." - Matthew Fletcher
"Being new to the property market I didn’t know where to start. Thanks to Marco I was able to connect with people from the industry which led to finding my first ever buy to let property. I can honestly say this was the start of many great investments." - Vanessa Serene

Bond Investing (Emerging Market vs Developed Market) / Corporate vs Government)
Currency Trading
Mortgage Note Investing
N, NN, NNN Lease Investing
Passive Income
Rental Properties
Retirement Account Investing (USA SDIRA, UK ISA, etc.)
Short Sales
Stock Investing
The meetings are designed to give an opportunity for an investor to meet other investors and to possibly find partners or capital for their deals while meeting new contacts.
The meetings are held every Sunday at the following times:
10:30AM San Diego, California, USA
12:30PM Dallas, Texas, USA
6:30PM London, UK & Cork, Ireland
7:30PM Warsaw, Poland & Stockholm, Sweden
8:30PM Kyiv, Ukraine

293745400.Tags: Personal Development,Law of Attraction,Motivation & Success,Entrepreneur Mindset,Success Mindset
293745400.Long Description:
Don't miss out on an incredible opportunity to learn the exact mindset that successful digital entrepreneurs and people have in order to capitalize on any global financial situation and make millions in the process.
Come and join us for an immersive and empowering jam-packed 90-minute online meetup session by one of the UK's leading digital marketers, Jay Hastings.
Have you struggled to create success as a small business owner or start-up entrepreneur? Don't worry, you're not alone. Jay has trained thousands of people over the years, and he understands that success isn't just about the training - it's about mindset.
At this FREE 'How To Develop a Winning Mindset For Success & Start a Business in 2023!' meetup, Jay will help you overcome the obstacles that prevent you from realizing your full potential. How successful entrepreneurs think

The mindset required to become fully financially free for years to come

What it really takes to succeed

- who wants to learn how to become financially successful
- who has attempted money-making courses in the past but has yet to
achieve results

Join us and take the first step towards unlocking your full potential and realizing your dreams. With the right mindset and guidance, anything is possible.
Look forward to see you there.

293689083.Name: German taxes , Tax return, Steuererklärung, Finance optimization
293689083.Long Description:
Join our webinar about tax return, named "Steuererklaerung" in Germany and about deductible positions & investments
We will answer your questions after a short but extensive presentation:
-do I have to do a tax return?
-when do I have to do my tax return?
-how much return can I expect ?
-how much are the income taxes in Germany? on which kind of incomes?
-do I pay the same amount if I have children? If I am married?
-how can I do my tax return? Do I need someone to do it?
-what is the difference between the software tools that I need to pay for and Elster from the Finanzamt, which is for free?
-in which cases can I choose my Steuerklasse?
-what happens if I earn much less or much more the next year? Shall I still pay in advance the same taxes?
-what are the main deductible positions in Germany?
-how do deduce my costs in my Steuererklärung?
-what are the main deductible investments in Germany?
-how do deduce my real estate, health or retirement investments?
Are you interested in learning how to pay less taxes, while preparing for the future, diversifying, and protecting your wealth ? To understand what the german fiscal system enables you and encourage you to do, in terms of investments and expenses?
Would you like some tips to submit your 2021 tax return statement?
Register for the workshop!
Drinks & little snacks included!
!!! Make sure your parameters in the group enables you to receive some messages!!!!
Organized by independant financial consultants, specialised on Expats
Please note that the workshop is NOT targeted on freelancers specificites, freelancers incomes and freelancers activities. There is another workshop on this specific topic :)
The workshop is about german taxes and tax return for employees AND freelancers on their personal taxes -not on their freelancer activities.

293639787.Name: Excel Online Training: Learn to Create Charts and Dashboard in Microsoft Excel
293639787.Long Description:
Come and join us to
Learn How To Create Charts And Dashboards In Microsoft Excel
In this online training session, you will learn how to create charts in Microsoft Excel to analyse sales data of a sample company. You will learn how to create Pivot-Tables to assess different aspects of the sales information, and represent the information from the tables as line, bar, and pie charts. When creating the charts, you will learn how to format them so they are easily interpreted and you will then assemble the charts in a dashboard to provide a global picture of the sales data.
Requirements To Join Online Training
Basic knowledge of Excel spreadsheets. This course is targeted to individuals that know to do simple calculations in Excel and want to now know how to create charts and pivot tables. Also, how to create a nice visual report - i.e. dashboard - similar to the image above.
Skills you will develop from this Excel Training
Line chart
Pie Chart
Bar Charts
Pivot Table
Data Analysis (presented in a dashboard)
## Learn step-by-step
In this online training session, the instructor will walk you through these steps:
Create Pivot Tables in Microsoft Excel
Create and format a Line Chart in Microsoft Excel to represent sales profits by month
Create and format a Bar Chart in Microsoft Excel to represent sales profits by Salesperson
Create and format Pie Charts in Microsoft Excel to represent sales percentages by product category and city
Create a Dashboard in Microsoft Excel containing charts and tables
This training session is intermediate level.
Your instructor is an Excel Expert and has been training many individuals to help them become more productive in their workplace through Microsoft Excel.
For more mini- Excel courses that are online and taught by an Excel Expert, see
https://excelmadesimple.odoo.com/prices
Feel free to contact me with any questions you may have.

293658749.Name: Mastering Excel SUMIFS - Boost Your Data Analysis Skills!
293658749.Long Description:
Description:
Join us for a practical and interactive workshop on mastering Excel SUMIFS - the ultimate function for complex data analysis!
Whether you're new to Excel or already familiar with its basic functions, this event is designed to help you level up your skills and become a pro at using SUMIFS for advanced data analysis.
During this session, you'll learn how to:
Understand the basic syntax and usage of SUMIFS
Apply SUMIFS to filter and aggregate data based on multiple criteria
Use logical operators and wildcards to refine your queries
Combine SUMIFS with other functions like COUNTIFS and AVERAGEIFS for even more powerful analysis
Solve common errors and troubleshoot SUMIFS formulas
No prior experience with SUMIFS is required, but some familiarity with Excel formulas and functions will be helpful. We'll provide sample datasets and hands-on exercises to help you practice and apply what you learn.
Our instructor, is a self-certified Excel expert with over 10 years of experience in data analysis and reporting. She'll guide you through the session and answer your questions to ensure that you leave with a solid understanding of SUMIFS and how it can transform your data analysis skills.
For best results, connect to this online session through your laptop with Excel installed and get ready to level up your Excel game!
Agenda:
Introduction to Excel SUMIFS and its syntax
Applying SUMIFS to filter and aggregate data
Using logical operators and wildcards to refine queries
Combining SUMIFS with other functions for more advanced analysis
Hands-on exercises and practice
Troubleshooting common errors and Q&A
Secure your spot on Meetup now. Space is limited, so don't wait too long!
We look forward to seeing you there!
Please note that the instructor teaches other Excel topics. Please see her website for Excel course packages and/or Tailored Online Excel Lessons
https://excelmadesimple.odoo.com/prices

292135977.Tags: Open Source,NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming),Machine Learning,Big Data,Data Engineering

Like last year, Europe will be a hybrid conference with both virtual and in-person elements. What’s more, we’ll be partnering with AI Summit for our in-person program.
Whether you decide to join us in-person or virtually, you’ll have the chance to learn about core fundamentals and recent developments in a range of topics:
Our all-new Generative AI track will feature sessions on the cutting-edge developments that have been sending ripples through all aspects of our society, such as ChatGPT.
The Machine Learning and Deep Learning track will give you the opportunity to hear from the creators and top practitioners as they demonstrate and teach the latest developments in Machine Learning and Deep Learning that solve problems in business and society today.
During our Machine Learning for Finance sessions, you’ll learn essential quantitative modeling frameworks as well as how to use machine learning and reinforcement techniques to invest, trade, and manage risk in finance.
In the NLP track, you’ll learn about the latest advancements and trends in NLP, including pre-trained models, with use-cases focusing on deep learning, speech-to text, and semantic search from core practitioners and contributors.
With the Mini-Bootcamp, you’ll have a chance to kickstart your data science career in less time and for less money with the Mini-Bootcamp, which features courses covering the fundamentals as well as intermediate and advanced topics.
Finally, during our Data Engineering and MLOps sessions you’ll explore use cases, best practices, and stories from the field to show how to effectively incorporate data science practice into the wider business process.

293548927.Name: Conférence Oh! - Félix Vallotton - Online
293548927.Long Description:
S'enregistrer sur Meetup s'est pas suffisant.
Inschrijven op Meetup is niet genoeg.
Registering on Meetup is not enough.
Chaque mois, les Alliances Françaises du Portugal, d’Espagne, de Belgique et des Pays-Bas ainsi que l’Accueil de La Haye vous proposent une Conférence Oh!
En juin, laissez-vous guider par Giulia FRANCESCHINI lors d’une conférence gratuite, en ligne sur Félix Vallotton.
Félix Vallotton (1865-1925) : Franco-suisse, peintre, graveur, illustrateur, sculpteur et écrivain, lié pendant un moment au groupe des Nabis. Ses œuvres peintes et dessinées sont assez tôt notées par le public : ses peintures sont lourdement critiquées alors que ses œuvres gravées sont louées. Ces dernières vont lui assurer des revenus financiers et vont lui ouvrir les portes de nombreuses revues satiriques dans la dernière décennie du XIX° siècle. Artiste polyvalent, il laissera une œuvre de près de 1700 peintures, quelques 200 gravures, des centaines de dessins et quelques sculptures.
📆 Jeudi 15 juin
⏰ 20h30 - 21h30
📌 En ligne, gratuit
📩 Si vous avez des problèmes ou des questions, veuillez envoyer un courriel à comm@afamsterdam.nl
Inscription sur : https://www.afamsterdam.nl/community/event-rsvp/?event_id=354

292827961.Name: Groupe d’écriture sur l’argent (en visio-conférence)
292827961.Long Description:
Dans le cadre de notre groupe MeetUp « Osons parler argent », nous vous proposons d’aborder l’argent de manière ludique, en participant à un groupe d’écriture.
Nous nous adaptons à la situation inédite du confinement dû au Covid-19 : L'ATELIER A LIEU EN VISIO-CONFERENCE avec "Zoom". Les codes de connexion seront envoyés aux participants la veille de l'atelier.
> Pourquoi participer à un groupe d’écriture sur l’argent ?
Le but est de vous permettre :
• de partager un moment convivial, (re)découvrir le plaisir de jouer avec les mots;
• d’exprimer, d’explorer et d’échanger des idées, des émotions, des questionnements, des expériences de vie, des difficultés, des réussites, des projets en lien avec l’argent.
> Comment ça fonctionne ?
Des règles de confidentialité, d’accueil inconditionnel et de respect de la liberté de chacun.
Des modalités de mise en œuvre qui stimulent la créativité et la réflexion :
• le groupe choisit un jeu d’écriture ;
• chacun, après avoir écrit pendant un temps défini, est invité à lire son texte au groupe ;
• les participants commentent.
• Une à plusieurs séquences, de durées variables, sont proposées au cours d’une même séance.
> Les animateurs, Malika El Bouazzaoui et Pierre Félin (https://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/Cafe-Philo-sur-lArgent/members/302828802/), vous attendent : « Venez nous rejoindre et, ensemble, osons écrire sur l’argent ! »
> Informations
Nombre de participants : limité à 6
Atelier gratuit
Contact : osonsparlerargent.asso@gmail.com
Site : www.osons-parler-argent.com

293610262.Long Description:
IF YOU WANT TO ATTEND THIS WORKSHOP PLEASE EMAIL: actinggymnasium@gmail.com
Are you getting seen for good quality auditions for paid acting work?
Are regularly meetings with the type of people who can move you forward in your career?
Are you happy with your agent?
Do you have an agent?
Are you getting PAID ACTING WORK?
If the answer to any of these questions is No; then you NEED The Business of the Acting Industry workshop.
This VERY HIGHLY PRAISED workshop is designed to explore the business side of the acting profession.
THIS WORKSHOP WILL BE DELIVERED ONLINE VIA VIDEO CONFERENCE. MAXIMUM 10 PLACES AVAILABLE.
Have a look at some of the stunning testimonials posted online by the dozens of delighted participants:
https://www.meetup.com/Acting-Gymnasium-unique-weekly-acting-workshop/about/comments/?op=all
Feedback from March 2019 workshop:
“ Gavin's workshop is amazing! “

“ I've attended many acting business workshops. This one stands out in a way that it is a well organised, capsule class which leaves you with practical knowledge and ideas of how to network correctly, approach agents and casting directors and build solid industry relationships with them without it being overwhelming. “
This session is just what you need to help you move forward to more PAID ACTING WORK.
If you are a professional actor knowing how to go out into the real world and find paid acting work is absolutely crucial. Understanding the business side of the acting industry is the key to success as an actor.
This workshop is a thorough and comprehensive analysis of all elements of the business side of the acting industry designed to give you a better understanding of WHAT TO DO AND HOW TO DO IT. This session will also provide you with key tips and strategies about how to get ahead in an increasingly competitive market. Key areas covered include:
Getting your name out there - processes and pitfalls
The mistakes some actors make
Self promotion in a digital age & Audition Tapes
Networking and making connections - what to do and not to do
Using social media as a promotional package
Alternative approaches to getting paid work
THE GRID - a NO BULLSHIT guide to getting paid work
Getting an agent - how to navigate this tricky world
Managing your relationship with your representation
Approaching the casting director
Handling auditions
How to grow your career
Knowing how to behave
Continuing professional development
Financial management
GAVIN MCALINDEN's productions have been Critic's Choice in The Sunday Times, The Guardian, The Daily Telegraph, The Sunday Telegraph, The Independent, The Independent on Sunday, The Financial Times, The Evening Standard and Time Out. He has been nominated for Cinnefoundation Prize, BBC Talent New Film-maker Award, Samuel Beckett Award for Excellence in Theatre and Off West-End Award for Best Ensemble Acting and Best Director.
